K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:1b-1: a'arya bo dhi satva pi ta ka n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:1b-2: bod skad du; 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:1b-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:1b-7: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2a-0: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na dbyar gnas @2a #//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2a-1: su gnas nas zla ba gsum 'das te dgag dbye mdzad nas chos gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2a-2: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2a-8: mu stegs can sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2a-19: lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bla mar byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2b-6: yo byad mang po yang brnyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2b-11: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2b-12: bla na med pa; lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2b-18: bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu'i 'jig rten 'di dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:2b-21: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams zil gyis mnan te rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon du byas nas bsgrubs te bzhugs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3a-1: spyod pa; thog mar dge ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3a-6: ma 'dres pa; yongs su rdzogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3a-8: yongs su byang ba rab tu ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3a-9: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi dge bar grags pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po yang mngon par byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga dha'i ljongs rgyu zhing mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po gang na yod pa der gshegs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3a-11: byon nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3a-12: de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na khyim bdag tshong dpon bzang skyong zhes bya ba sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3a-13: sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bya ba byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3b-0: nor dang yo byad @3b mang ba; gser dang dngul mang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3b-1: nor dang 'brus yongs su gang ba'i mdzod dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3b-16: zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba zhig gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3b-17: dge sbyong goo ta ma sh'akya'i rigs las mngon par byung nas dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu yul ma ga dha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por byon nas de rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3b-22: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3b-24: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3b-28: bar du dge ba; tha mar dge ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:3b-34: yongs su byang ba rab tu ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-1: goo ta ma de'i dge bar grags pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po de lta bu yang mngon par byung ba khyim bdag tshong dpon bzang skyong gis thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de lta bu dag mthong na legs par 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-3: bdag dge sbyong goo ta ma de blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-4: de nas khyim bdag tshong dpon bzang skyong khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs mnabs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-6: chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bskor zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-7: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar te spyod lam mdzes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-9: phyir ldog pa mdzes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-10: gzigs pas rnam par gzigs pa mdzes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-11: brkyang ba dang bskum pa mdzes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-14: lhung bzed bsnams pa mdzes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-15: kun nas mdzes pas bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4a-16: khyim bdag tshong dpon bzang skyong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-0: khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mdzes shing @4b dga' bar 'gyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-3: dul ba dang zhi gnas dam pa brnyes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-4: glang po ltar dbang po dul ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-5: mtsho ltar dvangs shing gsal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-8: gnod sbyin du mas mchod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-10: gser gyi kha dog gi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-11: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa; me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bebs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-12: me tog gi chu bo chen po rab tu 'bebs bzhin du rin po che sna bdun gyi padma 'dab ma bye ba brgya phrag stong yod pa la zhabs 'dor zhing gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-13: spyod lam brgya stong mang pos gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-14: de dag sems dad par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-16: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag bzang skyong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-17: khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-18: bcom ldan 'das goo ta ma dpal gyis 'khor 'di zil gyis gnon par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:4b-19: bcom ldan 'das goo ta ma gzi brjid kyis 'khor 'di zil gyis gnon par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-1: ldan 'das goo ta ma 'od kyis 'khor 'di dag zil gyis gnon par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-2: bcom ldan 'das goo ta ma gzugs kyis 'khor 'di zil gyis gnon par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-3: bcom ldan 'das goo ta ma sku'i kha dog gser lta bu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-4: bcom ldan 'das goo ta ma ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-5: skus lus can bde ba myong bar mdzad pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-6: bcom ldan 'das goo ta ma ni; dngos po thams cad kyis mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-7: bcom ldan 'das goo ta ma ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-8: 'jig rten thams cad kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-11: bcom ldan 'das goo ta mas ci zhig gzigs nas khab nas khab ma mchis par rab tu byung snyam du sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag tshong dpon bzang skyong gis tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-13: rgyal ba'i dpal dang grags dang gzugs dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-14: sngon chad bdag gis ji skad thos gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-15: de bas lhag par gser gyi gzugs bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-16: mdzes dang ldan par lham mer rab tu gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-17: gzugs ni shin tu mdzes shing blta na sdug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-18: sku yi kha dog gser gyi mdog 'dra bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-19: skar ma dag gi dbus na zla ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5a-20: dge slong mang po'i dbus na mdzes par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-0: mi mchog gi ni @5b spyi bo bltar mi gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-1: ri rab bzhin du mngon par 'phags par gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-2: gtsug gi spyi bo lha yi gdugs bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-3: kun nas byin gyis gzhol bar gyur pa lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-4: dbu yi skra ni 'jam zhing rab mnyen la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-5: aanda rnyil dang stang zil kha dog 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-6: g-yas su 'khyil la shin tu 'jam pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-7: rma bya'i mgrin pa ji bzhin nyid du gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-8: smra ba mchog gi dpral ba shin du mnyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-9: khyod kyi smin tshugs 'ja' khug lta bu ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-10: 'od gsal ba ni skar ma'i rgyal po ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-11: rdul bral smin mtshams spu ni shin tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-12: spyan bzang khyod kyi spyan ni dgar 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-13: 'gro ba rnams la mthong na mdzes shing dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-14: bdag ni blta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-15: mgon po rnam dag spyan la bdag phyag 'tshal; ;skyes bu dam pa'i shangs ni byin gyis mnyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-16: ji ltar gser gyi ri ltar rab tu gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-17: khyod kyi sgros ni bim pa byi ru bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-18: dag cing rnam dag nor bu rin chen 'dra; ;dul la dgyes pa'i tshems ni mdzes pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-19: snang bar byed pa rab tu dkar ba'i tshems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-20: padma'i rtsa ba ba zho chu skyar 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-21: sra zhing dam la thags bzang shin du dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-22: tshems dang tshems ni mnyam zhing shin tu 'byor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-23: rgyal ba'i mche ba mdzes shing rdul mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:5b-24: ngang pa'i khyu na ngang ba'i rgyal po ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-0: rnam dag dkar zhing rab tu dkar ba @6a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-1: bzhin; ;bde bar gshegs pa'i ljags kyis zhal khebs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-2: autpal dmar po rnam dag zangs kyi mdog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-3: nyi ma 'char tsho nor bu dag mdog bzhin; ;srab la ring zhing skyon med shin du yangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-4: goo ta ma yi snyan ni rab tu legs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-6: tshangs bcas 'jig rten lha dang mi la yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-7: bdag gis gang yang ma thos ma mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-8: bde gshegs mthu yis mgur na mthong ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-9: mgur gyi mid pa gtsang la 'od gsal te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-10: drang po dbus su 'gro ba yon po gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-11: ro yi ro mchog mi dang lha yi lha //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-12: dpung mgo rab tu zlum zhing thal gong rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-13: bdun po mtho ba 'jig rten kun tu grags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-14: mgon po mi dbang snying po dpal gyis kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-15: ri yi rtse la nyi ma 'char ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-16: mtho ba gnyis ni zhabs kyi mthil nas skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-17: phyag las gnyis skyes thal gong gnyis skyes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-18: mtho ba gcig ni ltag pa nyid na gcig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-19: dge zhing dag ste 'od gsal rab tu rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-20: bcom ldan goo ta ma yi phyag ring ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-21: ji ltar glang po'i rgyal po'i sna bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-22: phyag gnyis po ni 'dud pa ma bgyis par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-23: pus mo gnyis la phyag gis rab tu reg /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-24: sku yi ro stod sengge bzhin du 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6a-25: sku ni sred med bu ltar rab tu brtan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-0: n+ya gro dha @6b bzhin chu zheng gab pa'i sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-1: bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa stobs po che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-2: sku yi spu rnams g-yas 'khyil gyen du phyogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-3: re rer skyes shing shin tu 'jam pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-4: ji ltar padma chu dang 'dam mi gos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-5: de bzhin rdul dang du bas mi gos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-6: rta mchog dul ba yi ni ji lta bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-7: 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub ces gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-8: brla ni rab zlum smyig ma'i snying po bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-9: khyod kyi rje ngar byin gyis rim bzhin mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-10: zhabs gong dung ltar mtho zhing rting pa che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-11: khyod kyi phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas 'brel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-12: sen mo ring zhing sor mo nyi shu mnyam; ;sen mo zangs 'dra sor sen me tog can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-13: khyod kyi zhabs mthil 'khor lo rab kyi mtshan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-14: rtsibs ma stong ldan rab tu 'od gsal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-15: long bus long bu 'thab par mi 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-16: gom pa dag ni sa la yong mi 'dor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-17: sa la kun tu sor bzhi mi reg par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-18: 'jig rten rnams kyi gtso bo rab gshegs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-19: khyod ni gang du gom pa bor bar yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-20: rin chen padma skye ba ngo mtshar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-21: rgod par ma gyur dal zhing brtan par gshegs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-22: stag dang lha dbang 'gros kyis gzhan gnon zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-23: bag tsha med par stabs ni bsgyings te gshegs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-24: dpa' bo khyod kyi 'gros 'dra su la'ang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-25: mi ma lags pa rnams kyis bar snang las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-26: lha yi me tog char ni rab 'bebs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:6b-27: glu dbyangs sgras ni khyod la mchod par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-2: khyod kyi gzugs ni rnam thos bu bas lhag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-3: gzi brjid dag ni nyi ma brgya bas 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-4: tshangs bcas lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-5: khyod 'dra'ang med na lhag pa ga la mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-6: bdag gis khyod kyi cho 'phrul mchog mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-7: yon tan lhag pa gang dag gzigs gyur na; ;de bzhed pas na mi dbang rab byung snyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-8: bdag ni de la the tshom 'tshal bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag tshong dpon bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-12: gtse ba bcus gtses par mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-19: mya ngan gyis gtse ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-20: smre sngags 'don pas gtse ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-21: sdug bsngal gyis gtse ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-22: yid mi bde bas gtse ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-24: 'khor bas gtse ba dang bcu ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-26: 'jig rten gnas pa gtse ba 'di bcus gtses par mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:7a-27: zhes dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-12: brtson 'grus chung ba le lo can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-13: sems kyang gnas pa ma yin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-14: shes rab 'chal pa blun zhing rmongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-15: pha dang ma dang bu pho dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-16: bla ma la ni sri zhu spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-17: 'jig rten snang mdzad sangs rgyas dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-18: mthong nas blo ngan nem nur byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-19: zab mo rgyal bas gzigs pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-20: dam pa'i chos ni spong bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-21: mun pa'i phung pos rab tu khebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-22: 'phags pa'i tshogs la gus mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-23: kun nas nyon mongs 'di gzigs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-24: 'dus byas gang la'ang mi dga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-25: nyon mongs med pa 'dus ma byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-26: mya ngan 'das pa thob par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-27: gzhan yang kye ma'o khyim bdag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-30: phrag dog dang ser sna'i kun du sbyor ba dang ldan par shes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12a-34: ma rig pa'i ling tog gis khebs par mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12b-2: gti mug gi 'obs su chud par mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12b-6: 'dod pa'i rlung gis ded par mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12b-10: 'dod pa'i zug rngus shin tu zug par mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12b-14: khro ba dang 'khon du 'dzin pa'i du bas shin tu bdugs par mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12b-18: 'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar bar mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12b-22: zhe sdang gi dug gis khebs par mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12b-26: sgrib pa'i tsher mas bskor bar mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12b-30: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pas brtson 'grus nyams par mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12b-32: 'jig rten gnas pa yongs su 'khri ba bcu po de dag gis yongs su dkris par mthong nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12b-33: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12b-34: rga bas skyes bu rnams kyi gzhon pa 'joms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:12b-35: gzugs kyang rnam par 'jig cing gzugs ngan byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-0: @13a *// dran dang blo dang dga' ba med par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-1: 'gro ba rnams ni 'chi ba'i sgo mor khrid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-2: nad ni stobs dang drag shul rab tu 'joms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-3: mthu dang pha rol gnod pa thams cad 'phrog /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-5: mgon med shin tu rtul ba zhan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-6: 'chi ba srin po lta bur mi bzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-7: rtag tu skye rgu rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-8: stobs kyis rab tu mnan nas 'gro ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-9: phangs pa'i tshe ni ma lus zad par 'thung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-10: rga ba dang ni 'chi bas skyo 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-11: 'jig rten dag ni nad kyis gtses rig nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-12: mi dga' mi 'chi zhi zhing bde ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-13: chos rnams tshol phyir nga ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-14: me gsum gyis ni 'jig rten rab tshig pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-15: 'gro ba dag la skyabs gzhan ma mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-16: nga ni skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyur byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-17: bdud rtsi'i char phab me rnams zhi bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-18: skye rgu dag ni lam rnams rab stor cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-19: mig med ldongs pa rmongs par gyur pa mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-20: nga ni 'jig rten dag la mig sbyin zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-21: lam rnams bstan phyir nga ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-22: sgrib pa dag gis bsgribs shing kun bsgribs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-23: the tshom kun nas langs pa'i sems can rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-24: the tshom rab tu bsal bar 'gyur ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13a-25: chos rnams bstan phyir nga ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-0: sems can 'di dag phan tshun @13b mi mthun te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-1: glags dang skabs tshol gnod pa'i nyes pa can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-2: 'gras pa dag gi sdums ni bya ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-3: 'gro la phan 'dod phyir ni nga rab byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-4: pha dang ma dang sdug pa'i mchog rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-5: nga rgyal dbang gis mi gus sems can dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-6: nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-7: khyim bdag de phyir nga ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-8: chags pa yis ni bsgribs pa'i sems can rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-9: rdzogs phyir ltung bar byed pa mthong ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-10: nor bdun rgya chen rab tu rnyed gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-11: des ni sems can dbul ba med par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-12: sems can 'di dag phan tshun gsod byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-13: lus ni gdon mi za bar dor dgos kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-14: byis pa don med bdag lus gso mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-15: srid pa gsum las nga ni rnam par log /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-16: ji ltar khyod ni don mi shes pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-17: de 'dra bas ni 'jig rten gsum po gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-18: 'jig rten dag la don rnams bstan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-19: phan par 'dod pas nga ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-20: sems can dmyal bar lhung ba'i sems can dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-21: mi bzad rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-22: sdug bsngal drag po byed par mthong bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-23: de dag thar par bya phyir nga rab byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-24: gcig la gcig ni gnod byed sems can rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-25: byol song 'gro bar rnam par spyod mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-26: skye rgu mgon med mgon ni bya ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:13b-27: snying rje'i bsam pas nga ni rab tu byung //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-5: mi yi kun tu tshol ba'i sdug bsngal dang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-14: tshong dpon bud med dag ni mi 'dod pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-15: khyim yang spangs nas nga ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-16: byis pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i dga' la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-17: thams cad sdig pa rtsod pa'i dbang du song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-18: bdud rnams thams cad la ni dbang byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-19: byang chub rim par 'tshang rgyar nga rab byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-20: khyim na gnas pa dag ni nyes pa stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-21: 'di 'dra ba yi gnod pa 'di mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-22: sa rnams thams cad rnam par spangs nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-23: skye ba zad par bya phyir nga rab byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-24: de nas khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag kye ma'o 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14a-26: zhes ngo mtshar thob par gyur te //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14b-3: 'di la chos mchog dam pa rgya che ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:14b-4: rga 'chi mthar 'byin rab tu bshad du gsol //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30a-27: snying po med par g-yo zhing gsog /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30a-31: chos rnams snying po med par mkhyen //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30a-34: gang gis 'di ltar chos rnams kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30a-35: stong pa nyid du shes pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30a-36: sdug bsngal dag ni kun las thar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30a-37: de la rtsod pa med pa yin //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-4: srid pa las ni rdzogs skye skye ba ste //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-6: skyes nas nad dang rga dang 'chi ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-7: mi 'dod sdug bsngal chen po gzhan dag gnon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-8: 'dod pa med na len pa yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-9: len pa med na srid par mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-10: srid pa mngon par 'grub las 'das pa ni //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-12: de phyir khyed kun gcig tu 'dus gyur nas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-16: shes kyi khe 'dod rnyed pa 'dod ma byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-17: ngan ngon tsam dag gis ni chog byos la //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-19: gzhan gyi grong du nye bar 'gro bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-20: nga ni tshul khrims ldan zhes bdag ma snyems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-21: 'di ni tshul khrims ngan zhes gzhan ma brnyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-22: tshul khrims tsam gyis gzhan la gang brnyas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-23: snyems phyir de ni tshul khrims 'chal zhes bya //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-25: de dag nyid du de zin gsod pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-26: de bzhin bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-27: snyems pa de nyid kyis ni de bcom mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:30b-28: 'phya ba'i bsam pa can gyi gang zag dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:31a-2: de bas tshul khrims 'chal la'ang mi brnyas na //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:31a-7: rtag tu dben par dgon par gnas par bya //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:33b-10: khyim bdag khyed rnams nam chos thams cad mi len pa de na khyed rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:33b-11: khyim bdag khyed rnams nam chos thams cad la mi gnas pa de na khyed rnams mi 'byung mi 'jig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:33b-12: khyed rnams nam mi 'byung mi 'jig pa de na khyed rnams skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:33b-20: 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:33b-21: sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don @34a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-1: de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-2: skye ba dang ni 'chi ba yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-4: byis pa skyabs med gtse ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-5: de dag 'phags pa'i lam las nyams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-6: brgya lam 'jig rten snang mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-8: dal ba chud zos ma byed par; ;brtson 'grus brtan pa rtsom byos shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-9: gang la gnas te rnam sgom pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-10: shes rab kyis ni de yang ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-11: shes rab kyis ni de mthong ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-12: rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro; ;gang la gnas te sems sgom pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-13: thams cad stong par shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-14: chos rnams stong par rig nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-15: byang chub nyid kyang stong pa nyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-16: 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-17: me gsum de dag shin tu mi bzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-18: des na 'jig rten 'di kun rab 'bar yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-19: byis pa rig nas gnyid log khong mi chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-20: skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-21: smre sngags 'don cing sdug bsngal yid mi bdes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-22: 'jig rten 'di dag gtses par rig nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-23: chos rnams kun la gnas par ma byed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34a-26: bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba rnyed par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-0: bdag @34b cag rnams kyis bde bar gshegs pa las bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag tshur shog ces gsungs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-2: de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-3: de nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-4: de nyid kyis dge slong gi dngos por gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-8: de dag gis ni ngur smrig bgos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-9: de dag gis ni skra yang bregs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-10: kun kyang lhung bzed thogs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-11: de nyid du ni dgra bcom gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-12: ston pas dgra bcom rab mkhyen nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-13: dge slong gi ni dge 'dun dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-14: lha rnams mdun du mngon sum du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-15: ched du brjod pa ched du brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-16: 'jig rten gyi ni mgon po la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-17: sngon chad sbyin pa byin pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-18: gang na bde ba mang ba der //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-20: de dag gis ni nga mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-21: dad pa rab tu skyes par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-22: de dag sems ni dang ba la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-23: chos rnams kyi ni mchog bstan to; ;dgra bcom gyi ni gsung thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-24: bdag tu lta ba rnam par bshig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-25: stong nyid mngon du byas na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-26: de dag skye pa kun las grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-27: khyim bdag gi le'u zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:34b-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gyi bar du khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po mi g-yo ba'i gnas la bkod nas kun nas mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35a-0: @35a *// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lha rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35a-1: gnod sbyin ci 'jigs 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35a-2: bdag cag gis 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms dbul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35a-4: de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms kha dog phun sum tshogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35a-5: dri phun sum tshogs pa; ro phun sum tshogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35a-6: reg phun sum tshogs pa bcom ldan 'das la phul nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms de bzhes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35a-7: bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms phul ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe steng gi bar snang las ci 'jigs kyi 'khor mang po gnod sbyin drug khri brgya stong gis legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35a-8: zhes bya ba byin te rjes su yi rang ba'i sgra phyung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35a-9: de nas de'i phyir gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis rang gi 'khor rnams la bos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35a-11: da gzod de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms phul gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35a-13: dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35a-15: khyed rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-0: gnod sbyin rnams kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsod snyoms phul nas gnod sbyin de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang bsod @35b snyoms blangs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa las des bsod snyoms blangs par mkhyen nas sa phyogs de nas slar log go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-2: de ltar de'i tshe lha stong phrag du ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-3: klu stong phrag du ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-9: lto 'phye chen po stong phrag du ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-10: mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-11: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rnams bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i zham 'bring du dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che ba zhig tu gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-13: de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs 'khor dang bcas pas lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-18: lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma blangs te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gtor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-20: mngon par rab tu gtor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-23: mngon par rab tu gtor nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bsam pa yang mkhyen /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:35b-25: de'i 'khor gnod sbyin mang po'i bsam pa yang mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36a-1: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de na zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36a-8: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36a-9: des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas nas nyi ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36a-10: zla ba'i gzi brjid med par byas te sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te kha cig ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36a-18: nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer zhabs kyi 'og tu nub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36a-19: nam dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36a-20: nam gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer mdun du nub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36a-21: nam mi rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer g-yon du nub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36a-22: nam lha rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer g-yas su nub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-0: nam nyan thos rnams la lung ston pa @36b de na 'od zer pus mor nub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-1: nam rang sangs rgyas rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer phrag par nub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-2: nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa de na 'od zer steng gi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams su nub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-4: mthong nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-5: ci rgyus 'jig rten snang mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-6: 'jig rten kun la sman pa'i slad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-8: ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-9: sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-10: de ring su yis sa bon btab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-11: de ring su la lung yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-12: gang zhig mthar phyin rab tu zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-13: dpa' bo rnam par 'dren pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-14: rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-15: thub pa ci slad 'dzum pa bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-16: 'od zer don ni bshad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar gsungs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-18: 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-19: ci 'jigs rab tu dang sems kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:36b-20: bsod snyoms dag ni phul bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-0: @37a *// de ltar de phyir 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-3: sum cu gsum nas shi 'phos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-7: mi yi nang du skye 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-9: 'khor los bsgyur ba mi yi dbang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-10: gling bzhi dag gi dbang po ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-13: bskal pa bye ba nyi shur ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-14: rtag tu bsti stang byas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-15: lha yi nang dang mi nang du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-16: yang dang yang du kun tu 'gro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-17: phyis de rgyal srid bor nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-18: khyim med par yang rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-19: rkyen gyis byang chub thob 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-20: de ni mthar yang thug par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-21: gnod sbyin dag ni sum khri dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-22: gnod sbyin skye gnas 'phos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-23: sum cu rtsa gsum skye bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-24: sangs rgyas la ni gus byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-25: sangs rgyas byams pa mthong 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-26: de na mthar ni thug 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-27: dgra bcom pa yang thob 'gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-28: ston pa la ni su mi mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-29: gnod sbyin stong du tshang ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-30: byang chub mchog la rab zhugs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-31: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37a-33: kha cig srog chags kun phan phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-0: @37b byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-1: sangs rgyas 'dren pa stong rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-2: bkur sti dag ni byed par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-3: kha cig sangs rgyas byang chub phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-4: stong phrag gnyis dang gsum dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-5: me tog phreng ba dri rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-6: mchod pa dag ni mchod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-7: dag pa bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-8: 'dren pa bye ba phrag stong la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-9: kha cig bkur sti byed 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-10: 'di dag phyis ni byang chub reg /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-11: de nas ci 'jigs de yi bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-12: ri bo zhes bya rdzu 'phrul che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-13: 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag gyur ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-14: des kyang sems ni bskyed par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-15: des ni sangs rgyas bsti stang byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-16: thams cad du yang smon lam btab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-17: nga mthong nas ni mchod byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-18: byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-19: de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-20: ngan 'gro thams cad spangs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-21: sangs rgyas byams pa mthong nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-23: gdugs rnams bye ba phul nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-25: na bza' bye ba phul nas ni; ;de nyid du ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-26: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-27: byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-28: lo yang lnga brgya tshang bar ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-29: tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-30: 'di lta bu yi rnam grangs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-31: sbyin dang tshul khrims yang dag spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-32: gangg'a'i bye ma ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-33: de snyed bskal par spyod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:37b-34: dper gsungs pa ni de snyed du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-2: de dag dper yang shes nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-3: de bas lhag par spyad par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-4: sngar ni dper rnams gang spyod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-5: gangg'a'i yi ni bye snyed kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-6: bye snyed sangs rgyas mthong gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-7: de dag kun la bsti stang byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-8: ae ma'o ye shes ae ma shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-9: ae ma'o bla na med pa'i sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-10: sems can kun gyi 'dren pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-11: de ltar zhum par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-12: de phyir sems can kun gyi mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-13: sangs rgyas su yang de 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-14: de na de yi mtshan btags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-15: sman pa'i rgyal por rnam par grags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-16: lo ni bye ba bdun cur yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-17: srog chags rnams la chos bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-18: phyis gdod rkang gnyis gtso bo ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-20: rab tu dul ba'i sems rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-22: de la tha ma gcig po ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-23: dge slong bye ba nyi shur 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38a-24: 'dus pa rnams ni gang brjod pa'i //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38b-14: the tshom gcod pa bzang po yis //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38b-17: de la ngas ni skabs dbye'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38b-21: bcom ldan 'das 'di nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs zhes grag gi /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38b-24: de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos rang gi 'khor la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38b-25: grogs po dag shes par gyis shig /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:38b-27: de la grogs po dag mthu ci yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:39a-0: ci nus kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod @39a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:39a-1: pa'i las la spro ba skyed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:39a-2: de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo g-yog dang bcas pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas bzung ste ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i bar gyi lam de thams cad gseg ma dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:39a-6: me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar dag par byas so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:39a-18: padma dkar pos khebs shing ngur pa sgra 'byin par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:39a-19: lam de gser glebs pas rab tu g-yogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:39a-20: lam de gser gyi dra ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:39b-8: dge 'dun la gzhol ba'i sems dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40a-7: stobs bcu dang ni rab ldan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40a-8: mi 'jigs pa la rab gnas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40a-9: sems can don rnams bgyid par shog /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40a-13: 'jig rten snang bar byed par shog /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40a-16: rnam pa bcu gnyis dam pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40a-17: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40a-20: sems can rnams kyi don bgyid shog /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40a-26: mig dang ldan pa nyid gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40a-27: gnas dang rten dang skyabs dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40a-28: de bzhin dpung gnyen 'gyur bar shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40a-29: ji ltar 'dren pa grol mdzad bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40a-30: 'gro ba lngar ni skyes pa yi //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:40b-25: mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:41b-15: skye bo rab tu dga' bar gyur //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:41b-22: de dag gcig gis gcig mthong ste //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:41b-24: lha rnams bye ba phrag stong dang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:42a-5: ston pas lha dang klu rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:42a-6: mi rnams 'dus par mkhyen pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:42a-7: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:42a-8: phyogs bzhi dag tu rab gzigs nas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:42a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moo dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:42b-0: bsam nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan @42b pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:42b-1: bcun pa 'od srung chen po longs shig /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:42b-9: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'khor gyi mdun du chos ston te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-5: rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-8: bde bar gshegs pa de skad ces gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-9: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-10: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-11: las rnams gsum ni shin tu yongs dag par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-12: mtshungs med bde bar gshegs pa'i sku tshol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-13: phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun la byams pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-14: snying rje rgya cher bskyed nas sbyin pa byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-15: 'dod la log par g-yem pa rtag spong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-16: nam mkha' lta bu'i mchog gi sku tshol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-17: gser ltar dag cing mdzes pa'i gos rnams ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-18: dpag tu med pa gangg'a'i bye ma snyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-19: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-20: rgyal ba'i sras kyi 'jig rten mchog la phul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-21: g-yag gi rnga ma bzhin du tshul khrims srung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-22: yan lag nying lag bcad kyang dgra la bzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-23: brtson 'grus kyi ni pha rol phyin spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-24: sangs rgyas sku la smon pa yongs mi skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-25: shes rab thabs dga' rgya cher bsam gtan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-26: bsam gtan spyod yul dga' rgyal rnam par lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57a-27: chos dbyings dam pa bde bar gshegs pa'i sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-0: @57b de 'drar bdag gyur ces ni de la smon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-1: srid par 'gro ba dag tu dge byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-2: mi mchog gis ni byang chub mtshungs med thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-3: dag pa dri med gtsang zhing rdul bral ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-4: nam mkha' 'dra ba yangs pa'i sku thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-5: rang bzhin stong ste bdag dang sems can bral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-6: mtshan ma med cing sgra dang bral ba thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-7: mig gi yul kun las ni rab 'das pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-8: de 'dra'i sku ni thub pas yang dag thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-9: gzod ma nas stong ma byas ma byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-10: gzugs dang sgra bral yid kyang rnam dag pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-11: de bzhin gshegs sku mi g-yo gang thob pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-12: des ni phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-13: ji ltar sgyu ma sprul pa sna tshogs lus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-14: rta dang glang po bud med skyes pa'i gzugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-15: byis pa slu ba rdzun zhing phyin ci log /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-16: de bzhin stobs bcu rnams la lta par byos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-17: gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs dpag med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-18: ma byon rgyal ba de bzhin gang snang dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-19: chos nyid gcig gyur mnyam pa med pa'i sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-20: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing nam mkha' 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-21: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:57b-25: rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-0: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa @58a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-1: rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-3: rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-4: rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-7: 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-8: sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas dge slong gi 'khor la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-11: 'di bshad; dge slong ma'i 'khor la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-26: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-27: lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-28: tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-29: ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-31: rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-32: de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-33: skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-34: shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-35: rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-36: gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde rnams bshad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58a-37: snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-0: 'khor ji lta bu 'dus par @58b gyur ba tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi bar du 'dus par gyur pa de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa ci 'dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-1: sems can de dag la chos kyi mdo ji lta bur thos par bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi mdo thos par bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar yang dag par shes kyang chos bstan pa de gcig la gcig nges pa'i tshig mnod par 'gyur ba'ang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-2: thams cad kyang rang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa bden pa'i rjes su 'brang bas 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-14: shes par bya bar 'os pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-17: lus sim par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-18: sems sim par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-19: snying dga' bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-22: kun shes par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-24: mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-26: sengge'i skad kyi drag shul gyi nga ro'i sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:58b-28: rgya mtsho'i sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-0: ka la pingka'i nga ro'i sgra @59a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-2: tshangs pa'i nga ro'i sgra dbyangs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-8: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mgu bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-9: 'khor thams cad du grags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-10: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-12: gzhan yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbyangs 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste; de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-19: rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-24: tshangs pa yi ni sgra dbyangs su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-26: tshangs pa rnams ni tshim par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-28: de yi dbyangs ni byams dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-29: snying rje las ni yang dag 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-30: btang snyoms dang ni dga' ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-31: thub pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-32: srog chags kun gyi 'dod chags me //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-33: zhe sdang dug ni zhi byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-34: gti mug mun pa sel ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59a-36: 'dzam bu'i gling gi sna tshogs phyogs rnams na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-0: mir @59b gyur pa yi skad ni mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-1: kun na de yi sgra rnams sna tshogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-2: dbyangs 'di thos nas rjes su rtogs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-3: sa bla dang ni de bzhin bar snang lha //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-4: de dag ci 'dra'i skad la 'jug pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-5: de phyir thub dbang dbyangs ni rab zhugs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-6: rnam par nges thos mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-7: rkang gnyis dag dang rkang bzhi rnams dang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-8: rkang mang dag dang rkang pa med pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-9: thams cad la ni de yi sgra dbyangs 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-10: bskul nas rab tu 'chos shing tshar gcod byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-11: stong gsum 'di yi sgra rnams ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-12: tha ma dang ni 'bring dang de bzhin rab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-13: de dag rjes su 'jug dbyangs de sgrog ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-14: 'dul ba'i sems can thar par reg par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-15: rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-16: bzung ba dang ni bcings las byung ma yin; ;mnyam par bzhag pas 'phags pa'i bden pa 'chad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-17: sems can thos nas nyon mongs zhi bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-18: sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun sgra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-19: sbyin thos tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-20: mtha' yas sgra ni sems can thos byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni de 'dra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-22: dbyangs kyang mtha' yas ye shes mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-23: de yi dbyangs kyi tshad ni yong med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-24: de la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas dad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:59b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs la the tshom med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-0: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin @60a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-1: gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-5: thos nas rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-7: chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chags pa med pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-8: de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-10: rab tu rtog pa nas dad pas ngo mtshar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-11: rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-14: yongs su brtag pa bzung ste gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rtsva dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-19: chung ngu na sor bzhi'i tshad tsam yan chad ji snyed yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-20: skyes bu la la zhig gis de dag gcig tu spungs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-21: gcig tu spungs nas mes bsregs te tshig par gyur nas thal bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-22: thal bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho chen po ga na yod pa de dag tu blugs te lo stong du dkrugs kyang sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de dang ldan pas @60b rgya mtsho chen po de dang de dag nas thal ba de dag blangs te 'jig rten gyi khams de dang de dag tu 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi shing 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi shing che ge mo zhig gi rtsa ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-4: che ge mo zhig gi sdong po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-5: che ge mo zhig gi yal ga dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-6: che ge mo zhig gi lo ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-7: che ge mo zhig gi 'bras bu'i thal ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-9: phyogs che ge mo zhig gi 'dab ma 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-13: de bzhin gshegs pas chos dbyings rab tu rtogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-14: de rab tu rtogs nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-15: 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi thal ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-16: zhes rab tu mkhyen pa nas rgyas par byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-21: 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-23: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di la dad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-25: rab tu rtog cing de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas yid la byed pa de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:60b-26: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' ma ma thob par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-1: pas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rtogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-2: de shin tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las sems bskyed pa gcig kyang chud mi za'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-5: 'di la skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig dpes bshad pa'i don rnams kun shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-9: skyes bu la la tshe lo brgya pa lo brgyar 'tsho ba zhig gis skra'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar btsal bas chu'i thigs pa blangs te nga gang na ba der 'ongs nas phyin pa dang 'di skad ces /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-11: bdag gis chu thigs pa 'di khyod la gtams kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-12: nam bdag la dgos par gyur pa de na slar byin cig ces zer ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-13: de bzhin gshegs pas de blangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-14: de'i chu'i rgyun gyis bdas te 'dres nas lhan cig tu mthar gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-15: de nas skyes bu tshe lo brgya pa de lo brgya lon pa dang nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'di skad ces /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-17: bdag gi chu'i thigs pa de dgos kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-18: bdag la byin cig ces zer na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61a-21: ye shes de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skra'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar btsal bas chu'i thigs pa de rgya mtsho chen po de nas chu gzhan dang ma 'dres par blangs te skyes bu de la slar byin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61b-1: 'di ltar don shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61b-2: de gang gi don du blta zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61b-5: skyes bu'i chu'i thigs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i lag tu bzhag pa yun ring po zhig lon yang chud mi za ba de bzhin du sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61b-7: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu la dad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas yid la byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dmigs nas de'i phyir nam mkha' la me tog 'thor ba de dag thams cad dge pa'i rtsa ba mtha' ma ma thob par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61b-14: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61b-15: rab tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las sems gcig bskyed pa yang chud mi za'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang rnam par shes pa ma mchis par 'jug pa mchis sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61b-30: rnam par shes pa'i gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:61b-31: rnam par shes pa de la gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-2: rnam par shes pa gzugs la nye bar song zhing gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-5: dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-6: rnam par shes pa tshor ba la nye bar song zhing gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-9: dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-10: rnam par shes pa 'du shes la nye bar song zhing gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-13: dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-14: rnam par shes pa 'du byed la nye bar song zhing gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-17: dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel nas rgyas par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-21: gang len pa'i phung po lnga la mi gnas par rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs su shes pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-23: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-24: sa'i khams rnam par shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-28: nam mkha'i khams rnam par shes pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-30: rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62a-31: gang khams bzhi la mi gnas par rnam par shes pa'i chos kyi khams kun tu dbye ba shes pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-0: rnam @62b par shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-1: gang mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnam par rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-2: rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnam par rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-3: snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnam par rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-4: lces shes par bya ba'i ro rnam par rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-5: lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnam par rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-6: yid kyis shes par bya ba'i chos rnam par rig pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-8: rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-9: gang nang nye bar zhi zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-10: ye shes kyi phyir 'brang zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-11: rnam par mi rtog pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-16: yid la byed pa las skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-18: yongs su rtog pa las skye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-20: rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-21: gang 'dzin pa med pas snyems pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-22: dmigs pa med rnam par rig pa med cing mi rtog pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-24: gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos la rnam par shes pa gnas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-25: gang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos rnam par shes pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-26: rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-27: 'dus ma byas la rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-28: gang 'dus ma byas shes pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-30: gzhan yang gang skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-31: 'jig pa la rab tu gnas pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-32: rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-33: gang skye ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:62b-34: 'gag pa med pa la gnas pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-7: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la mngon par dad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-11: rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-14: ji ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma dpag med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-15: de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rtsva rnams ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-16: de dag skyes bu la las mer bsregs thal bar byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-17: lo ni brgya stong dag tu rgya mtshor dkrugs pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-18: de 'dra ba yi stobs bcu ye shes phra mnga' bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-19: thal ba blangs nas 'gro ba dag la lung ston pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-20: zhing rnams rab 'byams dag gi shing rigs 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-21: de tshig thal ba 'di zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-22: 'di ltar phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten khams kyi rdul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-23: thams cad rdul du byas nas rgyal ba rnams ston te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-24: de dag thams cad bgrang yang chags med the tshom med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-25: de ltar bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes nam mkha' bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-26: ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63a-27: gang dag 'dod chags spyod dang zhe sdang gti mug ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-0: spyod @63b pa kun gyi tshul shes bsam pa rnams dang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-1: gang gi blangs nyams gang gi thar par 'gyur ba mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-2: 'jig rten mchog gi stobs bcu rnams kyi ye shes ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-3: ji snyed phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings su rab zhugs kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-4: 'dren pa rnams la rtog dang rnam par rtog mi 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-5: bder gshegs sras po dad pa rgyal la dad par byed ///
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-9: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-13: rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing ngo mtshar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-14: rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-16: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-17: de rab tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas lham me /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-22: sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la nyi ma mngon par shar nas lham me /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas lham me /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:63b-30: srin bu me khyer gyi 'od de bas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-1: 'bru mar gyi mar me'i 'od 'di shin tu 'phags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-3: shin tu kha dog dang ldan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-6: 'bru mar gyi mar me'i 'od de bas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-7: rtsig pa chen po'i 'od 'di shin tu 'phags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-8: shin tu mchog pa nas shin tu rgya che ba'i bar du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-9: gang rtsig pa chen po'i 'od de bas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-10: me'i phung po chen po'i 'od gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-12: skar ma'i 'od gang yin pa'i bar du rgyas par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-15: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-18: de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-22: gzhan 'phrul dbang bye kyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-27: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-29: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-31: lus kyi rgyan rnams kyi 'od 'di shin tu 'phags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64a-34: shin tu kha dog dang ldan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-0: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams @64b dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-2: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'od kyang rgyas par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-6: 'od gsal nas dge rgyas kyi bar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-10: 'du shes med 'du shes med min dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-14: shin tu mthong gi ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-17: gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-22: shin tu kha dog dang ldan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-25: gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-28: gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od 'di shin tu 'phags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-31: shin tu kha dog dang ldan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-37: ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-38: shes rab dpag tu med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-39: rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:64b-40: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-0: ji tsam stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'od du btags pa gdags pas btags @65a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-6: 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi nang du gser tha mal ba bzhag na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-7: snag tsha'i gar bu bzhin du 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-11: de bzhin du sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-12: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'od du gdags pas btags pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun na lham mer mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-17: de dag gi nang na mchog ces bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-19: bla na med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-21: gang de bzhin gshegs pa nyi tshe ba'i 'od /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-22: las kyi rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa'i 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas shin tu khyab par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-25: nyi ma'i 'od kyi snang ba yang mi 'byung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-29: zla ba gcig par yang mi shes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65a-30: dus dang lor yang mi shes mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'od @65b 'dom gang tsam du byin gyis rlob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65b-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65b-9: don de nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65b-11: skyes bu la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul ji snye pa thams cad rdul phra rab tu byas nas rdul de dag thu bar blugs te shar phyogs su song nas rdul phra mo de ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas rdul phra rab gnyis pa bor zhing shar phyogs su song na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65b-13: rdul phra rang de thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65b-16: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65b-20: byang nas phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65b-23: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi mtha' dang mu gzung bar nus sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:65b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad @66a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66a-1: de; 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na ji tsam 'od du btags pa gdags pas btags pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od la ni rtsig pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66a-10: ri spos kyi ngad ldang ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66a-15: de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66a-16: ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66a-17: gang gis kyang sgrib par mi nus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66a-18: de dag thams cad las thal nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams mos par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66a-19: de la sems can la las ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od 'dom gang tsam du mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66a-20: gang de bas rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'od 'dom do tsam du mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-0: gang de bas shin tu rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'od rgyang grags tsam du mthong ba nas gang de bas kyang shin tu rgya chen pos ni 'od stong gsum gyi stong chen po tsam gyi bar du mthong @66b ste; de ltar na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-2: stong phrag brgya pa'i tshangs pas ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya'i bar du 'od kyis khyab par mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-4: sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i bar du khyab par mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-6: nam mkha'i khams ci tsam pa sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam ste; de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir de tsam du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-7: de byang chub sems dpas thos nas the tshom med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-12: rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-14: 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-16: nyi ma zla ba'i 'od gang dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-17: brgya byin tshangs 'od gang yod dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-19: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-21: gang rnams stong gsum khyab gyur pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-22: sangs rgyas spu yi 'od zer gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-23: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-24: nam mkha' dag ni ji tsam pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-25: de tsam 'od kyis khyab byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-26: blo gros rgya chen sems can gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-28: sangs rgyas 'od ni mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:66b-29: nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-3: ma mthong bas ni 'od de la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-4: 'od ni yod pa min zhes smras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-5: de bzhin sems can dman pa gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-6: rgyal ba'i 'od ni mi mthong ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-7: ma mthong bas na rgyal ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-8: 'od ni yod pa min zhes zer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-9: la las 'dom do tsam du mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-10: la las rgyang grags dpag tshad dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-11: la las stong gsum thams cad du; ;'od kyis khyab par gyur par mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-12: sa brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-13: bcu pa la ni gang gnas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-14: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-15: sa chen la ni gang gnas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-16: de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-18: bsam yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-19: sangs rgyas dag gi bya ba byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-20: de ltar sangs rgyas bsam yas te; ;sangs rgyas 'od zer bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-21: bsam mi khyab la dad byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:67a-22: bsod nams phung po bsam mi khyab //
