K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100a-17: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100a-18: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100a-19: mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du 'doms shing de bzhin du rjes su ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-2: snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-3: rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-5: nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas mngon par dad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-11: rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-16: gang gis sems can nyon mongs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-17: gang gis sems can rnams dag 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-18: de yang dpa' bo chen pos mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-19: mkhyen nas gtam rnams ston par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-20: gang du ma rig skye 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-21: nyon mongs rgyu ni tshul bzhin min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-22: de yi rkyen ni 'du byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-23: sdug bsngal rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-24: srid pa'i yan lag skyed pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-25: thams cad rtsa ba tshul bzhin min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-26: de nyid sangs rgyas rab mkhyen nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-27: de bzhin du yang ston par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-28: las kyi rtsa ba nyon mongs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-29: mi mkhas mngon par 'du byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-31: de yi rkyen ni rnam par shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-32: gang gis sems can dag 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-33: rgyu gnyis dang ni rkyen gnyis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-34: gzhan las rjes su mthun sgra dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-35: nang du tshul bzhin lta ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-36: tshul bzhin rgyu ni zhi gnas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:100b-37: lhag mthong bar ni rkyen yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-1: ba; ;de yang 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-2: tshul khrims la ni rnal 'byor gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-3: chos rnams stong par rab tu rtogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-4: thar pa'i sgo ni bsgoms pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-5: srid pa dog las thar par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-6: de dag sangs rgyas rab mkhyen nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-7: rnam sbyong skyes bu bud med la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-8: stong pa nyid dang mtshan med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-9: rnam par thar pa rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-10: bsam gtan la ni snyoms zhugs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-11: rang rgyal dang ni nyan thos rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-12: de dag rnams kyang dog par bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-13: de yi 'gran zla yod par gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-14: sangs rgyas bsam gtan rnam thar la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-15: dgra dang bcas med dog pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-16: sangs rgyas kyi ni stobs bdun pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-17: pha rol rgol bas thul bar dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bdun pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-21: stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-22: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-24: de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyis bdag dang sems can gzhan rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101a-25: gang zag gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101b-7: skye ba brgya stong nas skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du rjes su dran no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101b-13: 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma zhig na nga sngon che ge mo zhig tu byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101b-35: bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101b-36: bdag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101b-37: zhes 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dang bcas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101b-39: gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas du ma rjes su dran no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101b-40: sems can gang gi sngon gyi rgyu ji lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101b-41: rgyu gang gis sems can du 'gyur ba'i rgyu de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101b-42: mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101b-43: 'das pa'i sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:101b-44: sems gang gi 'og tu gang la dmigs pa'i sems skyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-0: @102a *// dmigs pa gang ma tshang bas 'gags pa de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-2: gang sems can gcig gi sems gcig nas gcig tu sems 'di lta bu zhig gi 'og tu sems 'di lta bu zhig byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-4: bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang tshig gis bshad pas ston par mi nus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-5: de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi yang thams cad de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-6: tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems rnams bshad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthar thug bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-15: bde bar bstan mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-16: sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag la kye sems can rnams /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-18: de sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-20: rang sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-21: chos la bskyed pa de dag dran par gyis shig ces dran par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102a-23: de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus dran par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-0: de bzhin gshegs @102b pas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa de las chos 'di lta bur ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-1: ci nas sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-6: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa shes pa'i stobs ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-10: nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo; ;byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas mngon par dad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-14: the tshom mi za ba nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-16: bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pas yang 'di skad gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-17: bdag gi dang ni de bzhin gzhan dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-18: 'jig rten sgron mas sngon gyi dran pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-19: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-20: skyu ru ra lnga lag mthil bzhag pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-21: ming rus de bzhin kha dog rnam par rtog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-22: tshe dang gnas dang 'chi 'pho 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-23: gang gi rgyu la sems can brtson ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-24: de mkhyen pa ni de la chos kyang 'chad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-25: 'gro ba rnams kyi sems dang sems byung chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:102b-26: gang dag 'das pa mtha' yas mu med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-2: rgyal ba'i ye shes chen po mnga' bas mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-3: sems can gcig gi sems rgyud sngon 'das pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-4: bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-5: bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye snyed du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-6: bshad kyang de yi mtha' mar phyin mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-7: sngon gyi spyod pa ji snyed de dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-8: phyi ma'i mtha' yi bar du ngas bshad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-9: mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes mi zad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-10: bcom ldan ye shes rgya mtsho 'di 'dra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-11: sngon gyi rgyal la bsti stang gang byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-12: sems can gang dag dge ba'i bsam gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-13: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi shugs la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-14: sngon dag dge ba byas pa rnams kyang dran //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-15: sngon ni bsod nams ji 'dra byas pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-16: de dag rnams kyang ston pa'i mthus dran te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-17: de dag dran nas gnas ni gsum la 'khod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-18: thar pa'i gnas las phyir yang mi ldog 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-19: bde gshegs sngon gyi sbyor ba mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-20: sems can thams cad kyis ni bsam mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-21: mtha' yas grags pa'i stobs ni brgyad pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-22: rgyal sras bdag nyid chen po dad par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyad pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-26: stobs de dang ldan pas zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103a-27: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-0: 'di la sh'a ri'i @103b bu; de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-1: mi las shin tu 'das pa'i lha'i mig rnam par dag pas sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-6: kha dog mi sdug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-10: lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-11: ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-12: yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-14: log par lta ba dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-15: de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-17: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du'ang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-18: yang sems can 'di dag ni; lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-19: ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-20: yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-21: 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-22: yang dag par lta ba ste; de dag yang dag par lta ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lhar skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-23: zhes sems can rnams kyi las ji ltar bsags pa rnams rab tu mkhyen to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:103b-24: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-0: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa brjod du med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma las @104a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-1: kyang shin tu 'das pa thams cad na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ji snyed snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-4: 'chags par gzigs so; ;sems can gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-7: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-8: dga' ldan gnas nas 'chi 'pho ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-12: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dang du 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-15: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gzigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-16: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-18: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang gzigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-19: nyan thos gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-20: shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gzigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-21: rang sangs rgyas gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-22: rdzu 'phrul ston cing yon sbyong bar gzigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-23: sems can gang dag snang bar ma gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104a-24: phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam du mi 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig gis gzigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-2: yang de bzhin gshegs pas shing rta'i 'phang lo'i tshad tsam la snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-4: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mi rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-6: de ltar mi snang bar gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang tshad med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-9: lha'i mig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can gang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur zhes sems can gyi khams la gzigs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-10: sems can ji tsam sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag gi mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-11: sems can de dag 'dul yang sems can gzhan gyis mi shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-16: nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-17: byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas mngon par dad pa nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-19: bde bar gshegs pa'i lha'i mig dri med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:104b-20: bskal pa du mar dge ba'i las kyis sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:105a-1: rgyal bas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:105a-2: rgya chen bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyang gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:105a-3: 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:105a-4: kha cig me yis 'khor cing sems can gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:105a-5: kha cig sangs rgyas ldan zhing kha cig stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:105a-6: thams cad rang byung gi ni spyan gyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:105a-7: sems can khams ni rgya cher bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:105a-8: gzugs can gzugs med gang dag ji snyed dang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas mu med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115a-14: nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang mtha' yas mu med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115a-15: sems can thams cad kyis zad par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115a-17: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115a-19: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115a-24: rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115a-29: de phyir yang dag mngon sangs rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115a-30: de bzhin gshegs pas mnyam pa gzigs //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-1: de dag sangs rgyas chos dang mnyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-2: slob dang mi slob chos rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-3: rang rgyal gyi ni chos nyid dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-4: gang dag 'jig rten chos rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-6: dge dang mi dge mi g-yo rnams //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-12: 'di dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs nas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-15: de bzhin du yang rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-16: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-17: rnam par thar pa rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-18: mi dbang gi ni mi 'jigs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-19: gnyis pa yang dag rab tu bstan //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-23: gang la ngo tsha ci yang med pa dang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-25: gang dag sdom pa nam yang yod min dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-26: 'dun dang zhe sdang gti mug 'jigs pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-28: gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin brdzun dang chang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-31: thams cad rnam par grol ba'i lam rgyud gcod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-32: gang dag mnar sems dgu dang nyes mang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:115b-33: mi dge bcu yi las kyi lam rnams dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:116a-1: shes pa; ;de dag la ni nam yang thar pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:116a-2: phyin ci log la zhugs par rig gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:116a-3: bag med yang dag ma yin smra la chags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:116a-4: rgyal ba rnams kyi mi 'jigs gsum pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:116a-5: chos nyid 'di dag la ni bsnyen par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:116a-6: gang dag rnam sbyong sgo ni tshad med la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:116a-7: mi gang ston pa byang chub reg par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:116a-8: rgyal ba nyid kyis ma thos thams cad rig /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:116a-10: ji tsam dge ba'i chos ni mang yod pa //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:116a-15: chos dang chos ma yin la de mi chags; ;zhi ba mya ngan med pa rnam grol reg /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:116a-19: thub pa stobs bcu rnams kyi chos 'di ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:116a-20: 'gro ba gang mos srid par 'gro ba la //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130a-5: sems can 'dul ba la 'dun pa nyams pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130a-6: rab tu dben pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130a-7: byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzud pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130a-8: dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130a-11: ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130a-14: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par 'dun pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130a-16: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus nyams pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130a-19: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130a-20: 'dul ba'i sems can la yal bar mi 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130a-21: chos nyan pa la brnyas pa med pa'i brtson 'grus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130a-22: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi sde snod nyan pa gang bskal par nyan kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu brnyes na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos ston cing zhal zas dang @130b bral ba'i rgyud kyis bskal par yang mi bzhengs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la blta bas tha na gang na sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gcig gi phyir yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing bzhud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la lus ngal ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130b-6: lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130b-8: brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa gsung pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130b-9: brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba gang gis sems can la 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus de sems can rnams la bsngags par mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130b-15: thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du dran pa nyams pa med cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130b-19: gang de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:130b-21: da ltar gyi sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par bltas kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa la phyis shin tu dran pa bsnyel ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-0: @131a *// sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes phyis gtang bar bya ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-1: phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-2: sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-3: sems can gyi bsam par 'jug pa la sems kyi spyod pa rnam par lta bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa la yongs su nyams pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-7: brtag par bya ba med kyang sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-8: 'di ltar de'i dran pa la nyams pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-9: de ji ltar dran pas bdag dran cing mi brjed pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-14: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-15: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-16: chos thams cad mi mnyam pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-19: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams she na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131a-20: de bzhin nyid gang dang mnyam pa ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-0: ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa de bzhin nyid kyang de @131b dang mnyam ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-1: mnyam pa nyid de la zhugs pas de'i phyir mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-2: 'dod chags kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dod chags med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-3: zhe sdang gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa zhe sdang med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-4: gti mug gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa gti mug med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-5: 'dus byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' yas de dang mnyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-6: 'khor ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-7: mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-9: mnyam pa nyid las mi nyams /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de yang mig dang ldan pa ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-16: yid dang ldan pa ma yin mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po mtshang ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-22: rlung gi khams la mi gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-25: gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-26: 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:131b-27: mi gnas pas na nyams pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-0: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa @132a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-1: med do; ;sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-8: gang chos thams cad rab tu shes pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-9: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-11: gang zag gzhan dag la chos go bar byed pa'i shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-12: so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-13: tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-14: tshig gcig la 'jug pas bskal pa brgya stong du mi chad par ston par shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-15: ji lta bu ci 'dra zhes dris pa ji lta ba bzhin du the tshom gcod pa'i shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-16: thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-17: theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa bstan pa shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-18: sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yongs su shes pa'i shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-19: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ci rigs par yang dag par rab tu ston par shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132a-21: shes rab ma zad pa bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab mtha' yas mu med zad mi shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-0: gang gi @132b phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-1: sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyang mi zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba nyams pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-8: nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-10: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-14: gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral bas rnam par grol zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-15: sngon gyi mthar yang ma bcings /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-17: da ltar byung ba la yang mi gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-18: mig dang gzugs la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-19: de bzhin du rna ba dang sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-22: lus dang reg bya la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:132b-23: mi 'dzin mngon par mi chags par gnas pa'i rnam par grol ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-0: sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de bzhin du shes pas de'i phyir sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @133a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-1: pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-2: ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la chos ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-8: lus kyi las de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pas kyang sems can 'dul; gsungs pas kyang sems can 'dul /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-9: cang mi gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-10: bshos gsol bas kyang sems can 'dul /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-11: spyod lam gyis kyang sems can 'dul /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-13: dpe byad bzang pos kyang sems can 'dul /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-14: gtsug tor bltar mi snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod lam gang gis kyang sems can 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133a-22: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133b-6: 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133b-8: shin tu nges pa'i tshig smra ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag de yang kun shes par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133b-10: rnam par shes par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133b-25: rab tu myur ba ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133b-26: shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133b-27: shin tu nges pa'i tshig rab tu mnyen pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:133b-50: dig dig po ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-3: zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-10: mkhas pa dga' bar byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-18: rma bya'i sgra; khu byug gi sgra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-21: ri dvags kyi rgyal po'i sgra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-27: rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra; kun shes par 'gyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-33: lkugs shing dig pa ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-35: dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-36: tshig dang yi ge ma nyams pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-37: shin tu nges par smra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-39: don gyi tshig dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-40: chos kyi tshig dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-44: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas bstan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-49: bsam gtan gyis yid du 'ong bar byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-50: shes rab kyis nges par brtags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134a-51: byams pas shin tu bsags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-0: btang snyoms @134b kyis nges par brtags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-1: theg pa gsum rnam par 'joms pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-2: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-4: rnam par thar pa gsum sbyong ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-5: bden pa yongs su bsgoms pa; ye shes yongs su bsgoms pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-8: nam mkha' tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-9: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-10: sh'a ri'i bu; de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-12: de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-14: 'di ni; de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-19: sems kyis brjod pa ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-21: rnam par shes pas ma yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa ni; ye shes kyis rab tu phye ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-23: ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-24: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de yang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su song ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-25: sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi rjes su zhugs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-26: sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa las rab tu dben pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:134b-27: chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-0: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi @135a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-2: dmigs pa las shin tu 'das pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-3: rkyen las skye ba dang bral ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-4: srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba sel ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-5: nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-6: bdud kyi las thams cad las nges par grol ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-7: sgyu dang g-yo thams cad dang bral ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-8: ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa spangs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-10: gti mug gi mun pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-12: lam gyi yan lag shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-13: nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-14: chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i yid kyi las so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco lnga pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-22: 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-25: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byung ba dang ma byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par mkhyen te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-26: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i rtsva dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135a-29: nags tshal byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i sems can gyi tshogs @135b sems can du btags pa byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135b-1: de dag na sems can sna tshogs byung ba ji snyed pa gzugs tha dad pa la sogs pa rgyas par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135b-2: sangs rgyas byung ba ji snyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa re res chos bstan cing brjod pa ji snyed pa yang gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135b-4: sems can ji snyed cig nyan thos kyi theg pas btul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135b-5: ji snyed rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas btul ba yang gong ma bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:135b-6: dge slong gi dge 'dun rnam par phye ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140a-0: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de @140a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140a-1: dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs na sengge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140a-6: sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140a-8: de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140a-9: bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bcus de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par dad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140a-14: rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing ngo mtshar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140a-20: de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140a-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod du rig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140a-23: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas de'i drung du gshegs te byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140a-26: rnam grangs 'dis kyang de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan @140b 'das rnams kyi snod du rig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140b-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas de'i drung du gshegs te byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston pa de lta rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140b-4: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal ba grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140b-7: bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140b-10: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140b-11: lha mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140b-12: gang 'di lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140b-15: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140b-17: mi dang lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten rang gis mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140b-26: yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:140b-27: yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs @141a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-1: rgyas phung po chen po'i nyan thos khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi nyan thos kyi tshogs chen po byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-2: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-5: sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-7: de'i dus na rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba chos can chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-9: rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i grong khyer rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rgyal po'i gnas 'byor pa mod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-12: dga' ba; 'gro ba mang po dang mis gang ba zhig yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-14: rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i khye'u gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa zhes bya ba sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-15: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-16: sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la bsnyen bkur byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-20: mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-22: de'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-23: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen pos ae ma'o gzhon nu 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141a-24: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-0: ae ma'o @141b gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-1: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-2: zhes de de ltar rig nas skyed mos tshal gyis ga la ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-3: gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ga la ba der song ste phyin nas steng gi bar snang la bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-4: gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-5: de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-7: sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-8: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-9: bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-11: byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-12: de la sems can thams cad la byams pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-15: sems can gyi khams ji tsam pa de tsam du byams pas khyab par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-16: sems can gyi khams ji tsam zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-17: nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-21: nam mkha'i khams 'dis khyab par ma gyur pa gang yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-23: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa 'dis sems can gyi ris na gang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sems can de gang yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-26: sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa de bzhin du gzhon nu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-27: byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa sgom pa yang dpag tu med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:141b-30: nam mkha' mtha' yas pas sems can mtha' yas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142a-1: mtha' yas pas byams pa mtha' yas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142a-3: yang sems can gyi khams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142a-9: de lta ma yin mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142a-11: sems can gyi khams tshad med pa ji tsam pa de'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142a-15: shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142a-19: de bzhin du phyogs mtshams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142a-20: phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'i rgya mtsho chen po gcig tu gyur pa la yongs su brtag pa bzung ste de la sems can gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142a-21: gzhan yang sems can gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gnyis blangs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142a-22: gzhan yang sems can gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gsum blangs nas gzhon nu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142a-23: yongs su brtag pa bzung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142a-24: de lta bu'i thabs kyis chu'i phung po chen po zad par gyur kyang sems can gyi khams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-1: sems can gyi khams de ltar dpag tu med cing de ltar mtha' yas pa de thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas khyab par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-4: gang de ltar dpag tu med par byams pa sgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i tshad gzung bar nus sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-13: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen po sgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-14: dpag tu med pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-16: de'i byams pa ni; bdag srung ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-17: gzhan la phan par gnas pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-18: mchog tu gnod sems med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-19: khro ba dang gnod sems kyi tha pa dang bral ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-21: rjes su chags pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-22: dad pa kun tu ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-23: 'khrul pa thams cad la nyes par lta ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-24: yongs su gdung ba med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-25: lus dang ngag dang sems bde ba skyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-26: gzhan gyi gnod par bya ba thams cad du ma lhung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-27: 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-30: khros pa la dang ba skyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-31: g-yul thams cad las sgrol ba; dbyig pa dang mtshon cha mi thogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-32: sems can rab tu thar par bya ba la dga' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:142b-33: khong khro ba thams cad dang bral ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-1: slong thams cad dang bral ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-4: tshigs su bcad pas nye bar 'tsho ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-7: rang gi gzi brjid kyis brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-9: byis pa thams cad rjes su srung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-10: tshangs pa'i lam dang mthun pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-12: thar pa'i lam gyi gtso bor gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-13: theg pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-14: zang zing med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-15: rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-16: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-17: dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-18: dbang po nyams shing ma tshang ba thams cad spangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-20: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-22: mi khom pa brgyad las zlog pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-23: chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa; 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-25: rgyal srid la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-26: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa rab tu sbyor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-27: tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-28: tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgo dang lam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-29: tshul khrims 'chal pa thams cad kyi skyabs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143a-30: bzod pa'i stobs kun tu ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-2: dregs pa thams cad dang bral ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-4: yang dag par sbyor ba'i bya ba sgrol ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-9: nyon mongs pa las byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-11: thos pa 'dzin pa shes rab kyi rgyu skyed pa'i byams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-12: bdag gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs 'joms pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-13: bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs sel ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-18: nyal ba'i spyod lam srung bar byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-19: rgod pa'i rang bzhin yid la byed pa thams cad sel ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-22: ngo tsha shes pas byugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-25: ngan 'gro thams cad sel ba'i byams pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-26: 'gro ba thams cad skyob pa'i byams pa chen po /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-27: bdag gi bde ba btang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-28: sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-30: nyan thos rnams kyi byams pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-32: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-33: sems can thams cad la skyob pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-35: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi byams pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:143b-37: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi byams pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-1: dpa' bzod pa rab tu thob pa rnams kyi byams pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-6: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de la rab tu gnas pas sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-10: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-15: skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-19: de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-23: gzhon nu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che'i thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-24: 'khor lo rin po che yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-26: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-27: snying rje chen po yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-28: snying rje chen po de yang sems can thams cad rjes su mi gtong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144a-30: byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po sems can thams cad la ji ltar 'jug ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-0: 'di @144b ltar byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings shing lta bar gyur ba rnam ba mang po la chags pa'i sems can dag mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-1: de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings pa spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-2: zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-4: byang chub sems dpas sems can yang dag pa ma yin pa phyin ci log gi gnas la gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-5: mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-6: sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-7: bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-8: mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-9: de dag gi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-10: zhes sems can rnams la byung chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-12: byang chub sems dpas phyin ci log gi 'dod pa la sred pa'i sems can de dag ma la yang g-yem pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-13: sring mo la yang g-yem pa mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-14: byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-15: kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-16: 'phags pa ma yin pa 'dus pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-17: mu cor smra bas yongs su gang zhing ngo tsha mi shes pas yongs su gang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:144b-18: 'di ltar ma'i rum mngal gyi mal na 'dug 'dug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:145a-0: de nyid kyi mngal gyi sgo nas byung la de nyid dang yang lhan cig tu 'dod pa sten par byed @145a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:145a-2: mngal gcig na lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa'i sring mo dang 'du zhing 'khrig pa byed pa lta ga la srid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:145a-12: chos las nyams shing chos ma yin pa la gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:145a-13: mi mthun pa'i chos la rab tu spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:145a-14: sems can dmyal ba'i spyod yul pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:145a-15: dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod yul pa'o; ;gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi spyod yul pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:145a-16: log pa'i lam la spyod yul pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:145a-21: wa dur khrod kyi mthar g-yang sa chen po dang nye ba zhig na mtshan mo khyis gtses nas g-yang sa chen po nas lhung ba de bzhin du gzhon nu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:145a-22: sems can 'di dag kyang wa dang 'dra'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155a-9: dga' ba'i rtse mo thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pas dam pa'i chos kyi dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155a-10: rtse ba yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155a-11: rkang pa byin pas chos kyi don gyi rkang pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155a-12: lag pa byin pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi lag pa rab tu byin pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155a-14: sna byin pas dbang po ma tshang ba med cing yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155a-16: nying lag byin pas kha na ma tho ba med cing mdzes pa'i yan lag sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155a-17: mig byin pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi mig mi sgrib pa yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo; ;sha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155a-18: khrag byin pas sems can thams cad kyi lus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155a-19: srog gi snying po med pa las snying po len pas nye bar 'tsho ba la mkhas pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155b-0: rkang @155b byin pas rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa'i lus thob pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155b-1: yan lag gi dam pa mgo byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi mchog bla na med cing ltag na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155b-3: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155b-4: 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i phan yon de dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155b-6: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa zab pa shes rab kyi snang ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155b-7: 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155b-12: mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155b-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155b-14: 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa na 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba gang yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155b-17: khyim bdag chun ba zhing skams la gnas nas ba lang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155b-18: gnam stong ma yin pa'i zhing gi rmo brko rdzogs par byas te sa bon btab nas rnam grangs 'dis gshol gyis 'tsho bas gser dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:155b-20: dngos po sna tshogs gzhan yang 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156a-3: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156a-10: dron mo 'thungs pa de las 'o ma 'grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156a-13: mar gyi snying po yang 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156a-15: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te 'jig rten gyi zang zing byin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156a-16: de mi 'dod kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang yongs su 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156a-19: gnas de gsum yongs su grub nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156a-21: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang yongs su 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156a-22: las stong gis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyang yongs su 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156a-23: las stong gis grub pa'i rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156a-24: las brgyas grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs su 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-0: las nyis brgyas grub pa'i gtsug tor spyi bor 'grub @156b bo; ;rnam pa dang yon tan brgyas yongs su rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung chen po yang 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-2: yon tan brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa'i tshems kyi phreng ba thags bzang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-3: phrag med pa snyoms shing dkar ba yang yongs su 'grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas mngon par 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-7: gang byams pa'i sems bskyed nas slong ba la sbyin pa byin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-8: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems bskyed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-9: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rgyun mi 'chad pa gcig 'grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-10: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas ting nge 'dzin brgya gangg'a'i rgyun ltar mngon par sprul pa mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-13: rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba thams cad la dbang thob pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-15: gangg'a 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pas yongs su gzung ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-18: byang chub sems dpa' mi 'chi ba 'dod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-20: mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:156b-21: 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-1: kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-3: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-6: bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mos zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-9: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-11: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-13: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos kyi tshe'i tshad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-14: lo stong phrag bcur gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos de'i dge slong stong phrag brgya ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-17: dgra bcom pa nyon mongs pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-18: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-19: dgra bcom pa sha stag gi 'dus pa chen po byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-21: de'i tshe thag pa zhes bya ba thags 'thag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157a-25: mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157b-0: de @157b de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos gang na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nas ha cang mi ring ba'i sa phyogs zhig na rang gi las byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157b-1: de nyin par las byas nas nub kar khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe rtag tu dus thams cad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos de'i drung du 'ongs nas ras kyi kha tshar gcig 'bul zhing 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157b-3: bsdu ba'i gnas kyis bdag bcom ldan 'das ras kyi kha tshar phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bsdu ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157b-4: ces des rim gyis ras kyi kha tshar stong lnga brgya phul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157b-5: des bskal pa bye ba phrag bco lngar ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157b-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157b-7: de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis brgya byin gyi bdag po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jam pa yid du 'ong ba dang po ba'i las de nyid kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes par byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157b-9: des thams cad la me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:157b-23: yo byad kyis bsti stang du byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158a-2: de phyis bskal pa grangs med pa zhig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du ste; de lo bye ba phrag nyi shu'i bar du gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158a-3: de'i dgra bcom pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shu zag pa zad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158a-5: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar gyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158a-6: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag lnga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158a-7: des chos bstan te sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i don byas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158a-8: der bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong gi bar du dam pa'i chos gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158a-9: de'i sku gdung yang rgyas par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158a-13: nga da yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158a-15: ras kyi kha tshar phul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158a-16: sems bskyed pas kyang mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-0: rgya che la @158b sbyin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-3: gal te sbyin pa rgya che la sems kyis ma yin na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-4: sbyin bdag rtsub mo zhes bya ba ltar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-5: des sbyin pa de snyed byin yang sems yongs su ma sbyangs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-7: 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas te thams cad yongs su thob par gyur pa la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-9: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-10: sbyin pa nyung yang mang por byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-11: ye shes kyi stobs kyis lhag par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-12: shes rab kyi stobs kyis rgyas par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-13: bsngo ba'i stobs kyis dpag tu med par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-15: gzugs 'dod phyir ni sbyin pa sbyin mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-16: longs spyod mtho ris 'dod phyir ma yin gyi; ;bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas mchog 'dod phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-17: de phyir sbyin pa chung yang du mar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-18: grags dang brjod pa dag dang sgra dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-19: g-yog dang bde ba nam yang mi 'dod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-20: 'chi 'pho skye ba kun kyang mi 'dod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-21: de phyir sbyin nyung 'bras bu chen por 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-22: zas dang skom dang chos gos gang phyin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-23: srid pa'i 'gro ba 'dod phyir ma yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-24: sbyin pas 'chi ba med pa'i sgo btsal phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-25: des ni skra rtse tsam yang sbyin pa byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-26: 'char ba med cing khengs pa med par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:158b-27: g-yo dang ser sna dag ni thams cad spong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-0: de dag le lo nam yang @159a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-2: de ltar de dag 'jig rten phan phyir spro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-3: rgyal po'i srid dang nor dang 'bru srog gtong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-4: de dag sems ni gzhan du mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-5: byin nas dga' ba chen po rnyed par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-6: sbyin zhing gtong la byang chub rnyed mi dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-7: pha dang ma dang bu ni sdug pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-8: slong dang 'jig rten kun la de bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-9: gang gis byang chub mchog spyod spyad pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-10: sbyin tshe rtag tu phrag dog med par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-11: de dag mthong na mi khro ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-12: ji ltar sngon gyi bzhin du smra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-13: mi mdza' dag dang rtag mdza' zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-14: skrag pa rnams la 'jigs med sbyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-15: de la dngos po gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-16: slong ba la ni sri ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-19: 'byung bar rtag tu smra byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-20: chos kyi sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-21: 'dod la brkam pa ma gtogs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-24: mtho ris bde ba 'dod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-25: sangs rgyas byang chub yongs tshol zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-26: grags pa chen po sbyin pa sbyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-27: bdag dang nor rdzas gzhan dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-28: mang po myur du gtong ba ni; ;de dag byang chub dam pa'i mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-29: nam yang gtong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-30: mkhas pa gzugs ni mi 'dod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159a-31: longs spyod dag kyang 'dod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-0: mtho ris dag kyang de @159b mi 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-2: lam shes lam la mkhas pa gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-3: gang dag bshes par gyur pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-4: brtan pa dag tu mi byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-9: de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do; ;sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-12: de la gang la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis legs par spyod pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-17: lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-18: ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-19: yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-20: de la lus kyis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-23: srog gcod pa spangs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-24: ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-25: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spangs pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-27: lus kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:159b-30: brdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-2: tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-4: ngag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-7: brnab sems med; gnod sems med cing yang dag par lta ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-9: yid kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-11: lus kyis legs par spyod pa gang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-12: ngag gis legs par spyod pa gang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-13: yid kyis legs par spyod pa gang yin snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-14: de yang 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-15: lus kyi las gang srog gcod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-16: ma byin par len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-17: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa ma byas pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-18: lus kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-19: de la ngag gis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-21: ngag gi las gang brdzun du smra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-24: tshig kyal pa ma smras pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-25: ngag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:160a-27: de la yid kyis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:161a-23: shin tu bzang po'i las lam bcu po 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:161a-24: gang dag srung ba byang chub sems dpa' mkhas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:161a-25: lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gang ma byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:161a-26: de ni mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan zhes bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:161a-27: gang dag ma byas ma bskyed mi len pa //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:161b-1: gang la kha dog med cing dbyibs med pa //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:161b-6: lus dang yid kyis shes par bya ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:161b-7: gang de dbang pos shes par mi nus pa //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:161b-10: nam yang tshul khrims dmigs par mi gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:161b-11: tshul khrims ldan zhes yid kyis mi snyems shing //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:162a-8: nam yang tshul khrims 'chal bar de mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:162a-9: thams cad chos ni gang dag mi dmigs pa //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:162a-20: de la 'chal ba'i tshul khrims lta mi nus //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:162b-4: bla ma la rim gro byed pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:162b-22: dge ba'i las rnams lus kyis byed //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:162b-27: chos la brtsams te gang zag la //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-2: nam du'ang ngag rtsub mo smra 'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-4: nam du'ang sdig pa mi 'dod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-5: byams sems gus dang bcas pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-6: bsam pa nyid kyis rtag tu blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-7: rgyal bas bstan pa thos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-8: chos 'di la ni gus dang bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-9: chos la gus par byas pas na //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-11: chos bcu po de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-14: tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa bcu bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-21: sbrul gdug pa bzhin du rtag par phan tshun mi 'phrod pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-31: bad kan gyis gang ste nad dang 'dra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163a-43: snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-0: @163b snyam du sems bskyed pa dang po de bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-2: tha na chu phor gang tsam yang 'bul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pas yang 'di skad gsung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-4: khams ni sbrul gdug ma rungs pa; ;bzhi po gcig la gcig brten te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-5: re re yang ni 'khrugs pa las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-7: mig nad dang ni rna nad dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-8: sna nad dang ni de bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-9: so nad dang ni mchu nad rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-11: smyo dang 'bras dang phol mig dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-12: me dbal g-yan pa rnams dang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-13: nad gzhan rnam pa mang po dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-14: lus las su ni 'byung bar 'gyur; ;lus 'di nad dang mtshungs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-19: mi rtag mi brtan g-yo ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-20: rab tu 'jig cing na ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-21: lus 'di rnag gis gang ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-22: shig shig po dang yun thung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-23: rnag gis gang ba'i lus 'di yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-24: sangs rgyas kyi ni sku yi phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-25: dge ba'i las rnams bsgrub par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-26: thams cad du ni rab zag pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-27: rnag gis gang ba'i lus 'di yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-28: chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:163b-29: sangs rgyas kyi ni sku 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-2: de 'dra'i lus ni thob par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-3: tsha ba dag kyang gang sgrib dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-4: bsil ba dag kyang rab srung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-5: lus 'di yang ni rga ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-7: gang dag grang dang tsha bzod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-8: lus kyis su ni thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-9: skyes bu'i bya ba byed pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-10: mchog gis lus ni thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-11: 'jig rten grags pa'i bla ma la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-12: rim gro dag ni rab bya ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-13: snying po med pa'i lus las su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-14: snying po dag ni blangs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-16: sems bskyed pa dang po 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-18: tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-20: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-32: ji tsam du rdza mkhan gyi bum pa chung tshad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-33: cha tshad byas pa thams cad kyang mthar 'jig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-34: de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di yang snying po med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-35: som btang ba'i snod bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164a-40: shing gi yal ga'i 'dab ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164b-0: 'bras bu ji snyed pa de @164b thams cad kyang mthar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164b-2: de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164b-4: 'bras bu smin pa bzhin du ltung ba'i chos can no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164b-7: dper na; rtsva'i rtse mo'i zil ba'i thigs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang nyi mas phog na ring por mi gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164b-9: de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:164b-11: zil ba'i thigs pa bzhin du ring por mi gnas pa'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:172b-18: mi yi lus ni shin tu dka' bar 'thob //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:174b-21: de 'dra'i sdig par lta ba dag /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:188a-13: gzhan gyi khar ma las par chos thams cad shes te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:188b-12: de la tha ma'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab ces bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:188b-13: gang la sa chen po gnas pa'i chu'i phung po 'phang du dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya @191a *//

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191a-5: gso ba thams cad rab tu shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191a-8: nam yang sdug bsngal mi 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191a-9: bka' blo mi bder yong mi 'gyur //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191a-20: nam yang mya ngan mi myong ste //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191a-26: sor mo sgur bar mi 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191a-27: sgur po zhar par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191a-28: glang po'i mgo ltar mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191a-30: de yi yan lag rgyas shing dkar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191a-32: rab tu mdzes shing blta na sdug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191a-33: kha dog ldan zhing mdzes par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191a-34: lha yis mngon par mchod par 'gyur //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-3: ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni //
