K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-7: mi des sems can thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-8: sems rnams thams cad rab tu shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-9: gom pa dag ni bdun bor bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-10: 'jig rten dbyangs kyis go bar byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-11: de yi ye shes mchog 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-12: shes rab dag kyang mchog tu 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-13: rnam par grol ba mchog 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-14: sems can rnams ni kun gyi mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-15: shes rab kyis ni shes rab sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-16: shes rab ye shes gnas pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-17: shes rab ye shes rnam par grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-18: sangs rgyas kun gyis brnyes pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-19: shes rab kyis ni rang bzhin shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-20: ye shes kyis ni shes bya shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-21: gang dag shes rab ye shes dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-22: thams cad de la dkon mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-24: don ni khyod la ngas bshad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-25: de ni mos pa chung ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-26: sems can rnams kyi don ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-27: gti mug gis ni rmongs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-28: sdig pas mngon par gtses pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-29: zhe sdang khro ba bskyed byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-30: chos la gus par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-31: nam zhig sems can mos chung tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-33: de na phyir zhing gcig la gcig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-34: gus pa byed par mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-35: gang tshe sems can mi gus shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-36: khro ba'i nyes la yid dga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:191b-37: kun nas nyon mongs sems kyis kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-2: gnas brtan gang dag rgas pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-3: rgas shing 'khogs pa gtugs pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-4: de dag 'chi ba'i dus byed tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-5: srid pa'i tha mar gyur ces zer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-6: gnas brtan gang dag rgas pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-7: rgas shing 'khogs pa gtugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-8: dgra bcom bsod snyoms zos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-9: sems can dmyal bar myur du 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-10: de dag tshul khrims rab dkon na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-11: dgra bcom par lta ga la 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-12: dad pas mchod rten byed 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-15: de ltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir slob dpon la bsnyen bkur dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-17: 'di 'dra ba'i phan yon de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-18: de bas kyang lhag pa dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dbang du gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-21: tshul khrims yongs su dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-22: de la tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-24: rnam pa bcus byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-26: sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-27: gzhan gyi rdzas la mi rku ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192a-28: gzhan gyi chung ma spangs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-0: sems can thams @192b cad la mi slu ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-1: gzhan gyi g-yog mthun pa la phra ma mi zer ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-2: tshig drag po bzod pa'i phyir ngag mi rtsub pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-3: tshig bsdams pas tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-4: gzhan gyi longs spyod la nga yir mi 'dzin pas brnab sems med pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-5: tshig ngan par smras pa bzod pas gnod sems spangs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-6: lhag gzhan mi 'dod pas log par lta ba spangs pa yin te; sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-7: rnam pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-9: gzhan yang rnam pa bcus byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-11: mi shes pa mi 'dod pas ma nyams pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-12: ngan par skye ba yongs su spangs pas skyon med pa'i tshul khrims yin; nyon mongs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pas 'dres ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-13: gcig tu dkar po'i chos rnam par spel bas bsra bsre med pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-14: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro bas rang dbang gi tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-15: mkhas pas ma smad pas bsngags pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-16: nyes pa thams cad mi sgrub pas ma smad pa'i tshul khrims yin; dbang po bsrungs pas shin tu sbas pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:192b-17: dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi phyir shin tu bsrungs pa'i tshul khrims yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-0: rnam pa bcu po de dag @193a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-1: gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-3: gzhan yang rnam pa bcus byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-5: rung ba'i tshod shes pas 'dod pa nyung ba'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-6: 'dod pa spong bas chog shes pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-7: lus dang sems rab tu dben pas nan tan gyi tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-8: 'du 'dzi la smod pas dgon par gnas pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-9: bdag gi khar las pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-10: pha rol gyi gdong du mi lta bas 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-11: lha dang mi rnams la mi slu bas ji ltar smras pa de ltar byed pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-12: rang gi sems nges par rtog pas bdag gi 'khrul pa la so sor rtog pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-13: pha rol gyi sems srung bas gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la nyes par mi lta ba'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-14: bsdu ba'i dngos po rjes su mi gtong bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i tshul khrims yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193a-15: sh'a ri'i bu; rnam pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-0: gzhan yang rnam pa bcus byang chub sems dpa'i tshul @193b khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-3: tha ba'i sems med pas sangs rgyas la dad pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-4: dam pa'i chos srung bas chos la dad pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-5: 'phags pa 'dus pa la gus pas dge 'dun la dad pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-6: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yid la byed pa dang ma bral bas 'dud pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-7: byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs bsags pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-8: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong ba'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-9: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas byams pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-10: nyam thag par gyur pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pas snying rje'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-11: chos la dga' zhing rab tu mos pas dga' ba'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-12: rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spangs pas btang snyoms kyi tshul khrims yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-14: rnam pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-16: gzhan yang rnam pa bcus byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:193b-18: sems can yongs su smin par byed pas sbyin pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-0: sems kun tu srung pas bzod pa'i tshul khrims @194a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-1: yin; mi ldog pas brtson 'grus kyi tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-2: bsam gtan gyi tshogs yang dag par rdzogs par byed pas bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims yin thos pa dang tshul khrims kyis mi ngoms pas shes rab kyi tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas thos pa yongs su tshol ba'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-4: rtag pa'i 'du shes so sor rtog pas lus la mi lta ba'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-5: sems la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pas srog la yid mi rton pa'i tshul khrims yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-6: thog ma nas tshul khrims yongs su dag pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshul khrims yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-7: tshul khrims thams cad yongs su bsngo bas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa'i tshul khrims yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-9: rnam pa bcu po dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-11: de ltar tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpas lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-12: mi'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa myong bar mi 'gyur ba gang yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-14: las kyi gnas mi shes pa gang yang med do; ;des sems can thams cad longs spyod dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-15: nye bar spyod pa thob par mi byed pa gang yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194a-16: so so'i skye bo phan tshun mi mdza' bar 'gyur ba de gang yang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-0: de la byang @194b chub sems dpa' khong khro ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-1: gang la byang chub sems dpa' ma dad par 'gyur ba'i brdzun du smra ba de gang yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-2: de sems can gang la yang mar 'du shes mi skyed pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-3: de sems can gyi ris na sems can gang la yang phar 'du shes mi skyed pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-4: de sems can gang la yang yid rton pa'i 'du shes mi skyed pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-5: de 'dus byas kyi chos gang la yang mi rtag par 'du shes mi skyed pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-6: de thams cad du 'du byed du gtogs par shes nas lus dang srog la mi lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-7: tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-9: bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pas yang 'di skad gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-10: tshul khrims 'di la gang gnas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-11: skyob pa yi ni chos sku dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-12: dbyangs dang kha dog gzugs rnams ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-13: de dag la ni rnyed mi dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-14: ldongs shing dmus long mi 'gyur la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-15: zha sgur zhar bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-17: de yi lus ni mdzes par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-18: stobs che zhing ni mthu che ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-19: gzi brjid che zhing gzi brjid rab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-20: shes rab dang ni brtson 'grus kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-21: sdig can bdud ni skrag par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-22: rgyal po yis ni mngon mchod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-23: lha klu rnams kyis bkur sti byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-24: the tshom thams cad chad par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:194b-25: de dag byams pa shin tu bsgoms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-2: gsod par byed kyang 'jigs pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-3: grags pa chen po chos spyod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-5: sems can thams cad gnyid log kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-6: snyom pa med cing mi nyal te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-7: phyogs bzhi dag ni kun tu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-8: legs par spyad pa yongs su tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-9: tshul khrims phung por gnas pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-10: rin chen mchog dang chung ma dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-11: bdag gi sha yang rab gtong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-12: byang chub lam ni kun tu tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-13: sangs rgyas chos ni bla na med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-14: mchog gi chos rnams yongs su tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-16: mchod rten dang ni sbyin par 'os //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-17: gshe shing yongs su spyo ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-18: nyes par byas pa thams cad bzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-19: bzod pa nyid la rab gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-20: bzod pa yi ni bsngags pa brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-21: mi bden pa ni mi smra ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-22: ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-23: byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-24: sa 'di dag kyang g-yo bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-25: sangs rgyas chos la nem nur med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-26: lha gzhan dag ni rab tu spong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-27: rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-28: lha gzhan yod par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-29: mtshon dag dang ni dug rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-30: phan tshun gnod par byed pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-31: sdums ni byed par 'gyur ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-32: de ni ma khas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-33: sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-34: bskal pa bye ba mang por yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195a-35: bdag gi don ni med gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-1: don rnyed na ni mdza' bo zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-2: phan tshun du ni rab tu smra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-3: don ni byed par ma gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-4: gcig la gcig ni gsod par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-6: sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-7: rin chen bkang ste sbyin byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-8: rtag tu bdag gi grogs su 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-9: gang dag mtshon rnams rnon po yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-10: yan lag nying lag gcod pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-11: sems can dag ni thams cad la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-12: sems ni mnyam par rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-13: sangs rgyas dag gi chos rnams phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-14: byis pa rnams kyi chos spong ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-15: chos la shin tu gnas gyur pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-16: tshul khrims rtag tu dag par 'gyur; ;chos kyi rjes mthun chos zhugs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-17: byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-18: sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-19: rig gsum bdud rtsi rab tu sbyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-20: tshul khrims phung por gnas byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-21: chos rnams thams cad mngon par bslab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-22: mkhas pa lha dang bcas pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-24: chos rnams kun la the tshom med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-25: bzo kun la yang rab tu mkhas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-26: sems can bsam pa shes gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-27: snyan pa'i tshig ni ston par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-28: tshul khrims phung po rnam sbyangs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-29: byang chub dam par sangs rgyas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-30: shing mchog drung du 'dug byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-31: sdig can bdud ni skrag par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-32: nyi zla dag ni snang ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-33: gzi brjid drag po 'od byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-34: de ltar sems can mchog 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-35: shes rab kyi ni mig las byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:195b-36: sems can rnams la lag byin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-2: rtag tu gsong por smra 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-3: de dag la ni phrag dog med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-4: bdag dang rin chen gzhan dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-5: mang po rnams ni myur du gtong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-6: de ni brgya lam byang chub mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-7: gtong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-8: dad dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-9: bden pa'i tshig la rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-10: tshul khrims phung por rab gnas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-11: de dag la ni sgyu med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-12: rdzun zer ba dag 'ongs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-13: sbyin zhing bya zhes zer yang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-14: bden pa'i tshig la gnas pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-15: dad pas de la dad par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-16: phan tshun gcig la gcig smra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-17: chos gos dang ni bsod snyoms rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-18: 'di bzhin smras te ma yin yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-19: de la yid ni 'khrug pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-21: de ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-22: 'du byed thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes skyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-23: sems can thams cad la pha mar 'du shes skyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-24: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yon tan med par 'du shes skyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-25: tshor ba dang rnam par rig pa la rnam par rig pa med par 'du shes skyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-26: de mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par yang sems kyis mngon par mi sgrub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-28: gal te sems kyis mnyam par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-29: mya ngan las 'das pa sems las 'das par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196a-30: sems kyis mi mnyam par byed na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-0: chags @196b pa'i sems su 'gyur bas ches mi mnyam par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-1: mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-2: chags pa'i sems bskyed nas 'gags pa de'i bag la nyal gyis sems de'i rang bzhin du skye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-3: mi bden pa'i dmigs pa la mi bden pa'i sems sdug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-8: zhes mos pa byed pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-10: rnam par grol ba gang na ba der zad pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-17: 'dod chags skad cig gis zad par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-18: 'dod chags kyang gzhan la zad pa yang gzhan zhig yin du zin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-19: 'dod chags yang dag pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-20: de ltar 'dod chags yang dag pa ma yin pas zad par 'gyur ba yang sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-22: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa las byung ba kun tu rtog pas phye ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-23: gang kun tu mi rtog pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-26: yang dag pa ma yin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-27: de la 'dod chags byed pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-28: yang dag pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-29: gang yang dag pa ma yin pa de la sdug bsngal med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-30: yongs su gdung ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-31: gang yongs su gdung ba med pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-32: yang dag pa ma yin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:196b-33: gang yang dag pa ma yin pa de la gdung ba med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-0: bsil bar gyur pa mya ngan las 'das pa yin pas de la 'dod chags med @197a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-4: sems dang ldan pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-5: 'di ltar 'dod chags zad par byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-9: mya ngan las 'das pa yang gzhan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-10: gang gzhan yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-11: pha rol bas kyang pha rol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-12: pha rol bas kyang pha rol gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-13: mkhas pa rnams yongs su tshol te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-16: gang snying po med pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-18: gsog gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-20: gsob gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-28: mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyis stong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-29: gang sems can med pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-34: ci yod pas nga zhes bya ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-41: nga yir 'dzin pa log pa 'di 'byung zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-42: nga yir 'dzin pa las mngon par 'du byed pa 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-43: de la mngon par 'du byed pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-46: lus kyis mngon par 'du byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-47: ngag gis mngon par 'du byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197a-48: yid kyis brtags nas ngag rtsub po smras te de nas phyis lus kyis gnod par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-0: @197b gzhan du 'du shes pa la 'du shes 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-2: byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-3: 'du shes kyi mdud pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-5: de la byang chub sems dpas phyin ci log gi 'du shes 'di lta bur rig nas su yang sten par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-7: bsten pa las de'i 'jigs pa 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-11: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la yid mi rton pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la pha mar 'du shes bskyed ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-16: 'di la yun ring po'i dus nas mar ma gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-17: phar ma gyur ba'i sems can gang yang rnyed par sla ba ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-18: sems can thams cad kyang pha mar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-19: de dag la 'dod chags kyi sems skyes na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-21: zhe sdang gi sems skyes na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-24: rnam grangs 'dis ci nas sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i gnyen yin par de ltar rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:197b-26: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa yangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-0: bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i dus de'i tshe na mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa @198a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-4: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-5: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-6: de lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-7: de'i nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu'i 'dus pa chen po byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-8: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dran pa rnyed ces bya ba zhig rgyal po'i rigs su skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-9: gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-10: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-11: de btsas ma thag tu mas bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong byin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-12: phas bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong byin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-15: snag gi gnyen mtshams kyis bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong byin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-16: pha ma'i gnyen bshes kyis kyang bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gnyen gyi g-yog tu byin na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i phas khang pa gsum byed du bcug pa 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-22: byang chub sems dpa' dus bzhin du khang pa'i steng na 'dug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-23: gang na 'dug pa der sil snyan thogs pa brgya stong du ma 'ongs nas bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-24: rol mo'i sgra phyung ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198a-26: sgra 'gags ma thag tu sgra 'di dag ga las byung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-1: gang du 'gags zhes yongs su tshol te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-2: de mtshan mo'i 'du shes kyang mi skye /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-3: nyin mo'i 'du shes kyang mi skye zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-4: gzhan du na rtag par 'du shes skye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-5: de mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-7: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dran pa thob pa de lo stong phrag bzhi bcur nam yang yid rol mo la chags par ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-8: lo stong phrag bzhi bcur nam yang 'dod pa la ma spyad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-9: de nyid na de khyim na gnas bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi rnams la bsam gtan byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-10: mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrubs nas de khyim de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang las bcom ldan 'das mchog gi tshogs can de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der song ste bcom ldan 'das mchog gi tshogs can de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dngos po cung zad cig zhu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-13: bcom ldan 'das mchog gi tshogs can de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi nyin par yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-14: de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i drung du phyin nas dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-16: de la dge slong dag na re /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:198b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-0: de yongs su mya ngan las 'das zhes thos nas sa phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing brgyal te kha bub tu @199a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-1: sa'i steng du 'gyel nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-3: chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-4: bag med gnas su bdag song nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-5: bdag nyid yongs su bslus par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-6: bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-8: mgon po bdag gis ma mnyes byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-9: bdag gi skyabs gyur su zhig yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-10: bdag la sangs rgyas ma brjod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-11: ma ni bdag gi dgra yin snyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-12: skyes ma thag tu de yi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-14: gang gis 'dod la bdag sbyar ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-15: pha ni bdag gi dgrar sems te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-16: de dag dbang du gyur pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-17: 'jig rten mgon po ma mnyes byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-18: 'di ltar sangs rgyas gsung sgra ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-19: yan lag drug cu bdag ma thos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-20: bdag gis sangs rgyas ma mnyes byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-21: bdag la nyams pa chen po byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-22: 'jig rten phan mdzad thugs brtse de lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-23: chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-24: bag med pa yis de ring dus 'das te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-25: rkang gnyis gtso bo bdag gis ma mnyes byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-26: bskal pa khrag khrig bye ba phrag brgyar yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-27: sangs rgyas brgya lam mthong ba'ang rnyed par dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-28: bde gshegs mya ngan 'das nas phyin pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-29: rgyal ba deng 'dir bdag gis ma mnyes byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-30: skyes ma thag tu sangs rgyas ma brjod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199a-31: pha dang ma ni de ring dgra yin snyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-0: gal te rgyal ba bzhugs pa @199b mthong gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-1: chos rnams nyan cing mchod pa bya ba zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-2: bde gshegs mya ngan 'das nas gdod 'ongs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-3: de bzhin gshegs kyi yan lag drug cu po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-4: de dag kun dang ldan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-5: rgyal ba'i de dag bdag gis deng ma thos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-6: mya ngan 'das nas 'dir ni bdag phyin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-7: de ring bdag la nyams pa chen po byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-8: sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis rtag bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-9: gya nom chos rnams bdag la mi ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-11: byang chub sems dpa' de sa phyogs de nas myur du langs te bcom ldan 'das mchog gi tshogs can de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khri la ngu zhing lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas sa phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-12: sems can mchog ni yang dag ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-13: yang dag chos rnams bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-14: byang chub dam pa mchog gi phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-15: bdag gi sems ni yang dag skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-16: shes rab chen po yang dag gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-18: rgyal ba khyod kyi ci 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-20: bdag sngon stobs kyang chung ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-21: shes rab zhan pa bdud kyi phyogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-22: khyim gyi gnas na mchis pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-23: mi yi gtso bo ma mnyes bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-24: sngon bgyis bsod nams mchis pas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:199b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-2: de phyir shin tu sdug bsngal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-3: lha dang klu yi mdun du ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-4: bden pa'i tshig rnams bdag gis brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-5: ci ste bdag ni yang dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-6: ji skad smras pa bzhin gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-7: ma 'ongs pa yi dus kyi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-8: glang po chen po don gzigs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-9: yang dag nyid kyi chos ston pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-10: mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-11: mi khom par ni mi skye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-13: bud med dngos por mi 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-14: bdud kyi bcing ba gcad par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-15: mngon sum du ni chos ston pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-16: sangs rgyas rnams ni rtag tu blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-17: mthong nas rab tu dad par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-18: dad nas bsti stang rim gro bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-19: bdag gis gang smras tshig 'di ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-20: yang dag bden par 'gyur zhe na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-21: bden pa des ni sangs rgyas 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-22: byang chub bzhin du bzhugs par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-23: tshig 'di rnams ni smras pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa co ger bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-25: lha rnams bye ba phrag stong gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-26: de tshe rab tu gos rab gtor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-27: de ni rab tu yid dga' nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-28: bar snang la ni 'dug gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-29: bar snang la ni 'dug nas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-30: rgyal ba de la tshigs bcad bstod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-31: snang bar gyur pa phan pa'i thugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-32: rdzu 'phrul chen po dam pa gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-33: mchog gi chos rnams chos mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200a-34: sangs rgyas smra ba mgon po dran //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-0: des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas 'khor rnams rgya che tshim par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras @200b so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-1: bdag ni mi gtsos lung bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-3: bdag gi rjes su slob gyis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-4: de bzhin gshegs la rim gro gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-5: bdag la rjes su thugs brtse'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-6: mya ngan 'das pa'ang bzhengs gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-7: 'jig rten mgon po bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-8: su zhig sangs rgyas dad mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la des dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-11: rim gro byas nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis de nas shi 'phos pa dang bde 'gro mtho ris su skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-12: de bskal pa bye ba phrag nyis shur ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-13: bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur 'dod pa la nam yang yongs su ma spyad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-14: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir de dag thams cad la yang mchod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-15: rim gro cher byas te thams cad du yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas de bskal pa tha ma /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-17: lus tha ma la bdag gi dngos po tha ma thob pa'i tshe rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas s'a la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-20: skyes su 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-21: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:200b-23: bcom ldan 'das s'a la'i rgyal po'i tshe'i tshad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i rgyal po'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-5: nyan thos 'dus pa gcig la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-6: dge slong bye ba phrag nyi shu yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-7: nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-8: dge slong stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-9: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-12: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-13: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang rgyas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'a la'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-16: lo stong phrag bcur gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-18: bskal pa bye ba nyi shur ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-19: ngan 'gror nam yang ma song ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-20: bskal pa bye ba nyi shur yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-21: 'dod pa dag la yong ma bsten //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-22: de yi bar du sangs rgyas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-23: stong phrag bdun rnams mya ngan 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-24: der ni tshangs par spyod spyad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-25: chos 'dod par yang rtag tu gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-26: de phyir byang chub sangs rgyas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-27: rgyal ba s'a la'i dbang por gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-28: bye ba stong phrag sum cu rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-29: byang chub mchog la rab tu bkod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-30: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-31: byang chub dam pa sangs rgyas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201a-32: bskal ba bye ba nyi shur ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-0: srog chags rnams @201b la chos bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-1: stong phrag dag ni bzhi bcu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-2: gzhan yang bye ba nyi shu snyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-3: thams cad zag zad drang srong gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-4: dge 'dun de tshe de skad byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-5: ston pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-6: ring bsrel shin tu rgyas par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-7: mchod rten stong phrag drug cu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-8: bye ba dag kyang der byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-9: mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-10: lo ni stong phrag bcur gnas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-11: rgyal ba'i bstan pa thos nas ni; ;su zhig de la dad mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-12: sangs rgyas kyi ni chos thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-13: mkhas pa su dag nem nur med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-15: myur du mya ngan 'das la reg /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-17: de ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la ma dang phar 'du shes bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-18: 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-20: zhe sdang gi sems skyes pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-24: gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid la mi mthun pa mang du gnas pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-25: de la 'dod chags kyi phyir tshul bzhin yid la byed pas 'dod pa la yang dag par mi mthun pa skyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-26: de 'dod pa dang 'dod pa'i mi mthun pa yang rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-28: 'dod pa'i mi mthun pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:201b-30: gang mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs la mngon par chags pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-2: gzhan yang 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-3: gang rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra la mngon par chags pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-4: de bzhin du sbyar te gang snas shes par bya ba'i dri dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-5: lces shes par bya ba'i ro dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-6: lus kyi shes par bya ba'i reg bya la mngon par chags pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-8: de la gang mngon par chags pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-9: lhag par zhen pa'o; ;gang lhag par zhen pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-11: gang kun tu sbyor ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-13: gang mngon par 'grub pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-15: de yang dag pa ma yin pa 'drid pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-18: yang dag pa ma yin pa 'drid pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-21: shin tu nges par bcings pa'o; ;cis bcings she na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-22: gzugs kyi 'ching bas bcings pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-23: bcings zhes bya ba nas sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-26: reg gi bar gyi 'ching bas bcings pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-27: bcings zhes bya'o; ;gzugs kyi 'ching ba gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-29: lus thob pa'i gzugs de la gang bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-31: gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-34: ther zug tu 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202a-37: gong bur 'du shes pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-1: yang gzugs kyi 'ching ba gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-3: lus mngon par grub pa de la rim gro bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-4: snyam nas de bdag la byams pas chung ma la mngon par chags par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-5: gzugs kyi 'ching bas bcings nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod thob pas mi dge ba'i lam mngon par 'du byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-6: 'dod pa'i nyes pa mi shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-7: de la 'dod pa'i nyes pa gang zhe na; nyes pa dag la 'dod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-8: nyes pa la 'dod pa med mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-9: gang ngan song du gzhol ba'i 'dod pa'i nyes pa de dag bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-11: de la ngan song du gzhol ba'i 'dod pa'i nyes pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-14: sdig pa mi byed pa cung zad kyang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-15: de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal yongs su gzung bar mi 'gyur ba gang yang med ces bshad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-17: stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su rab tu brtags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-18: ji ltar bdag gi chung ma lta bu dgrar gyur pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-26: gang ye shes dang ldan pas zin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-27: rab tu yang dag pa'o; ;gang mi shes pas yongs su zin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:202b-28: yang dag pa ma yin pa'o; ;mi shes pas gang yongs su bzung zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-2: des de ltar yongs su bzung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-3: phan tshun du de ltar yongs su bzung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-4: 'phags pa'i lam gyis kun tu ma bzung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-7: chung mas kun tu bskor cing sred pa nye bar len pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-8: rab tu 'byung ba'i bar du gcod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-9: tshul khrims kyi bar du gcod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-10: bsam gtan gyi bar du gcod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-11: mtho ris kyi bar du gcod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-12: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du gcod pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-14: bran mo yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-17: chung ma yongs su 'dzin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-18: dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar du gcod pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-19: gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-22: chung ma yongs su 'dzin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-23: dgrar gyur pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-26: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-27: mdor na mi dge ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-28: tha na zas bzang po'i yang bar du gcod pa'o; ;sangs rgyas mthong ba'i bar du gcod pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-29: gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-31: dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-32: sangs rgyas blta bar dad pa rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-33: chos mnyan par dad pa rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-34: dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya bar dad pa rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-35: dal ba'i 'byor ba rnyed pa'i bar du gcod pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203a-36: gong ma bzhin du sbyar te dad pa'i nor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-5: ngo tsha shes pa'i nor rnyed pa'i bar du gcod pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-8: bu mo yongs su 'dzin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-9: ma dad pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-12: bu mo yongs su 'dzin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-17: ngo tsha mi shes pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-20: bu mo yongs su 'dzin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-24: me'i phung po yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-25: sbrul gdug pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-30: smre ba'i sa med pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-31: chos dkar po thams cad rku ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-35: chung ma la chags pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-36: rdo'i ser ba 'bab pa la chags pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-37: ral gri'i so la chags pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-38: lcags kyi khri bsregs pa la chags pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-42: byug pa la chags pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-44: lcags kyi tho lum gyi phreng ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-45: bshang gcis byugs pa la chags pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-50: las byed pa'i mi yongs su 'dzin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:203b-51: sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-8: phag pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-10: khra bo dpag tshad brgya pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-13: bu mo yongs su 'dzin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-16: 'khrug pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-18: lcags kyi khri dpag tshad stong pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-20: kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me dang 'dra bar gyur pa dang mthang sbyar kyang bla'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-22: mas byin pa'i chung ma la rgyang ring po nas kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis lta ba yang de lta ma yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-23: mthang sbyar ba lta ci smos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-30: kun nas mnar sems kyi rtsa ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-40: shes rab kyi mig dang mi mthun pa'i rtsa ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-42: lcags dang rdo bsregs pa bkram pa'i sa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-44: pha rol gnon par byed pa dang 'dra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-46: log pa'i las kyi rab tu gzir ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-47: ci'i phyir chung ma zhes bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-50: khur rab tu len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204a-52: khru yongs su thogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-0: khur gyis @204b nyon mongs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-3: de'i phyir chung ma zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-4: sems can dag de la gso bar byed pa zhes kyang bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-5: srid pas 'khol bas chung ma la gzhol zhing chung mas yongs su zin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-11: de'i phyir chung ma zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-12: chung ma'i phyir khur chen po mi 'dor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-16: phung po lnga po gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-21: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-22: phung po lnga po de dag gi khur mi 'dor bas de'i phyir chung ma zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-23: ci'i phyir god rnying gnyis pa zhes bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-25: tshul khrims nyams pa gnyis pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-26: cho ga nyams pa gnyis pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-27: yang dag pa'i lta ba nyams pa gnyis pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:204b-28: bza' ba dang btung ba gnyis pa'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:228b-26: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:228b-27: de dag las la dga' bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:228b-28: las la dga' zhing las la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-1: smra ba la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-3: gnyid la dga' zhing gnyid la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-5: 'du 'dzi la dga' zhing 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-6: de dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-9: kun chub par byed par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-10: pha rol la go bar byed par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-11: pha rol la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i bar du gcod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa rab tu 'jig par byed pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-15: dge slong sdig can las gzhan gang yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-17: de'i dus na bar du gcod par 'gyur ba bcu pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-19: mkhas pa dag gis de khong du chud par bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-20: de'i dbang du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-22: de ni bdud kyi las kyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-23: bar du gcod pa mang po 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-24: dkar po'i chos ni spong bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-25: dben pa dag ni 'dod pa med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-26: shes rab chung zhing blo ngan pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-27: dam pa'i chos la mi gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-28: chos ma yin pa spyad byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229a-30: de ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-0: bla ma mkhan po @229b slob dpon rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-1: mgon dang skyabs ni byed 'gyur yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-3: bdag gis bskal pa bye stong du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-4: sdug bsngal 'jig rten don spyad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-5: me gsum dag gis tshig pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-7: bdag gis byang chub mchog thob ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-8: tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab bskor bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-9: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-10: bdag mtshungs med na ga la lhag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-12: nga la btang snyoms de dag byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-13: pha rol phyogs ni bsten pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-14: de dag rab tu sdug bsngal 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-15: byang chub kyi ni lam rgyu yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-16: sbyin pa las ni zlog par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-17: sangs rgyas bstan dang rab ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-18: lam ngag las kyang rmongs par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-20: gang du stong pa nyid bsngags shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-21: nan tan la ni gang gnas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-24: yang dag min la yang dag 'dzin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-25: dam pa'i chos rnams smod pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-26: bar du gcod pa mi 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-27: sangs rgyas la ni dga' ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-28: gus pa brtan par gang gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-30: bzang po rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-31: dga' ba skyes par rig nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-32: bdud rnams yid ni mi bde nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-33: de dag de la bar chad rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-35: dge slong cha byad bsgyur byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-36: 'di ni byang chub lam min na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-37: ci phyir 'di la yongs rgyug ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:229b-38: de ni rab tu 'gyod par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-0: @230a *// mdo sde 'di la rgyu yod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-1: snying po brtan par rab gnas la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-3: phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-4: bdud kyis kun nas bslangs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-5: ji ltar bde ba bzhin du bzung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-6: 'di ni chos min zhes smras nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-7: des ni mya ngan 'das pa spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-8: de dag ston pa btang nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-9: chos la don du gnyer ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-10: bdag la sred pa bskyed byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-11: sems can dmyal bar myur du 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-12: gang dag chung du byung ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-13: stong pa'i chos rnams mi gnyer te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-14: yul ni so sor gnas gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-16: chos rnams kyi ni mchog 'di yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-17: mnyan nas 'gal ba smra bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-18: dngangs shing skrag nas rab 'bros pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-19: phyi ma'i dus na byed par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-20: mi chung ba dag gzhan rnams ni; ;ston par byed pa mi 'byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-21: yang dag chung ngur gyur pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-22: de dag rnams kyang btang snyoms 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-23: 'jig rten mgon gyi bstan pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-25: bar du gcod pa mang 'byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-27: de na rab tu nges pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-28: srog bor dgon par gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-29: chos 'di dag ni bsgoms byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-32: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230a-33: 'di lta bu'i mi bzod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-0: dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig pa mthong nas @230b brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs kyi shugs rab tu bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-2: 'di lta bu'i mdo sde byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu mnyan par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-4: yi ger bris nas bcad bar bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-5: gzhan la yang go bar bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-6: rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-7: des kyang 'du shes bzhi bskyed par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-9: bdag gi pha'i nor gyi phung po 'di rab tu 'jig par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-10: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa des bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag grangs med pa nas bzung ste dka' ba spyad pa yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-11: de'i phyir rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba gzung bar bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-12: kun nas rab tu gzung bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-17: skyes bu zhig la bu gcig cig yod la byams sdug yid du 'ong zhing mi mthun pa med par snang ba de g-yangs chen por lhung bar gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-18: des de lag gis bzung ste sems can dmyal ba'i g-yangs 'dir lhung bar ma gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-20: rab tu 'dzin pa de bzhin du sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:230b-21: gang skyes bu dam pa de dag nga la dad cing chos dkon mchog bla na med pa 'di yang yongs su mi gtong zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231a-0: mya ngan las 'das pa la yang re bar 'gyur ba de dag de'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur bas ngas de dag @231a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231a-1: la byang chub mchog 'di gtad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231a-5: g-yul chen po'i nang na gang skye bo mang po bsrung ba'i phyir dmag gi mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231a-10: g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba de dag de na g-yul mi bzad pa chen po'i dus na skye bo mang po'i phyir dmag gi mdun na 'dug pa de bzhin du sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231a-11: de'i tshe dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par nye bar gnas pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231a-12: gang lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231a-15: go cha sra ba bgos pa de dag brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231a-16: bdud kyi dmag las rgyal zhing 'di lta bu'i chos dkon mchog 'di las snying po cung zad tsam len par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231a-19: tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yongs su spong ba la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed cing rtsod par mi byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231a-21: sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yang dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231a-22: zhes skye bo mang po la sgrog cing shes par byed pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231a-25: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis legs par bshad pa la rjes su yi rang ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-0: de lta bu'i gang zag rnams la bsod nams kyi rnam par @231b smin pa chung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-2: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-5: skyes bu dam pa de lta bu ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-6: shin tu dkon te; skyes bu mchog ces brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-7: skyes bu rab ces brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-8: skyes bu dpa' bo zhes brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-9: skyes bu chen po zhes brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi phyogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-12: de dag sder mi smra mi 'khrug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-13: de dag nan tan snying por byed pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-15: 'chi ba'i mtha'i bar du nan tan snying por bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-16: 'chi ba'i mtha'i bar du dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-17: 'chi ba'i mtha'i bar du stong pa nyid la mos par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-19: chos de bzhi dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-20: de'i tshe de'i dus na dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i dus /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-21: dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-22: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i phyogs mang ba'i dus /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-23: 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig kun tu tshol ba mang ba'i dus /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-27: nyon mongs pa snyigs ma'i dus /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-29: dus gsum la gnas par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-30: 'thab mo nye bar zhi ba la gnas par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-31: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-33: dus 'di gsum la rab tu gnas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:231b-34: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-2: rga shi zad par byed dang ldan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-3: de la phyir zhing nyams par mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-4: bdag don skye mang don phan ldan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-5: gang dag ngas bstan chos thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-6: tshul bzhin gnas par 'gyur ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-7: de yi ston pa nga yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-8: de dag nga yi nyan thos yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-9: gang dag chos rnams thos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-10: tshul bzhin gnas pa ma yin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-12: ji ltar rgya mtshor shing rta bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-13: bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-14: sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab dka' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-15: rnyed kyang mnyes par mi byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-16: de dag rnams kyang bdud dbang song ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-19: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-22: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-24: mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba de'i gsung rab la sdig pa'i dge slong drug 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-25: shin tu mthong zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232a-30: mes byin zhes bya ba rnams byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-0: rtags par smra ba rnams 'grogs bsdongs shing phan @232b tshun du yid rton cing gnas pa de dag gis khrims 'di lta bu zhig byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-1: bdag cag re res kyang khyim brgya brgya gzung bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-2: khyim brgya yongs su rdzogs pa la der 'ongs te gcig la gcig bsnyad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-7: brgyar ma grub pa la bsnyad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-8: zhes de lta bu'i khrims byas nas grong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-12: pho brang 'khor du dong nas de dag thams cad khyim gcig tu dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-13: khyim gcig tu dong nas gcig la gcig thog ma nyid du sangs rgyas la mi snyan pa zer ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-14: sangs rgyas la mi snyan pa ji skad zer zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-15: khyim der phyin nas 'di skad ces smras te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-20: gal te bdag med du zin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-28: sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa su /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-32: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba so sor yang dag par myong ba su /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-33: gang khyod la 'di skad du bdag med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-36: gang zag med ces smra ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-37: khyed kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-38: dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin no; ;zhes zer ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:232b-44: gang dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-1: pa'i grogs por gyur pa de dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-2: zhes de skad smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-3: de dag gis de dag la khyed de ltar shes pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-5: sdig pa'i grogs po gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-7: de ci'i phyir gang khyed la 'di skad du bdag med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-10: gang zag med ces zer ba la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-15: dge slong de dag re res kyang zla ba phyed kyis khyim lnga brgya lnga brgya log par 'dzin pa la btsud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-16: sh'a ri'i bu; de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi nyan thos dge slong dgra bcom pa dri ma dang nyon mongs pa bsal ba dag grong du dong ste phyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-20: bu mo dag gshe shing mi snyan pa zer /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-21: tshig ngan pa rtsub pos spyos te tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad zer ro; ;khyed ni lam la rmongs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-22: chos shes pa ni byed ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-23: khyed ni chos las nyams pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-24: thams cad sems can dmyal bar 'gro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-25: de ltar dge slong de dag la tshigs su bcad ba'i dbyangs kyis gshe zhing mi snyan pa smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-26: sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod cing slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233a-27: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-0: chos kun la ni bdag med @233b de; ;rtag med ther zug med do zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-1: sangs rgyas kyis ni chos bshad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-2: gso ba dang gsog dang stong pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-3: 'dus byas thams cad snying po med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-4: brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-5: byis pa rtag tu 'drid pa'o; ;de bzhin gshegs pas bdag med sems can med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-6: srog med gang zag med par chos bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-7: zhes tshigs su bcad de smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-8: sbyin dang zas dang len pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-9: tshor ba rgya chen myong gyur la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-11: bdag med par ni gang smra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-16: bu mo skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i tshig bzhin du byed pa de dag las srog chags drug khri brgyad stong de nas shi 'phos nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-17: de na de dag gi lus gzugs 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-18: nya lta bu mngon par grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-22: 'di lta bu'i lce mngon par grub pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-25: chang tshong gi re lde chen po lta bu ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-26: de dag gi lce de la lcags kyi gshol mang pos rab tu rmos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-27: de dag gi lus re re la yang mdung thung brgya brgyas dmyal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-28: steng gi bar snang las kyang lcags kyi thu lum kun tu 'bar ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-30: kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-31: 'bar ba dang bcas par gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:233b-32: 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa lus kyi steng du 'bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag @234a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-2: glog lce rab tu 'bar ba'i mda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-3: brgya phrag mang po stong rnams ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-4: rtag tu lus la rab 'bab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-5: mi dag na tsha myong bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-6: thams cad lus ni kun tu 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-7: me lce 'bar bar bsnyen pa dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-8: dpag tshad brgya snyed gang ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-9: lus las me lce rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-10: re re dag gi lce la yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-11: de snyed gshol gyis rmo bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-12: kun gyi lce ni dral bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-13: sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-14: sdig pa'i grogs po bsten byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-16: tshul khrims ldan pa rnams spangs pas; ;myur du ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-18: skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa drug po de dag de nas shi 'phos te mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes nas de dag re re'i lus kyang dpag tshad brgya brgya par mngon par grub par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-19: lus re re la yang kha stong stong mngon par grub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-20: kha re la yang lce gnyis gnyis chu zheng du dpag tshad bzhi tsam yod pa mngon par grub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-21: lce re re la yang gshol lnga brgya lnga brgya mngon par grub par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-22: de dag lcags kyi thu lum dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234a-23: lcags kyi gshol gyi rmos nas de dag gi lce bshags nas aa na zhes 'dzar kyang mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-0: de dag re re'i mgo la yang sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma bye ba phrag stong gnas shing mgul ba gcod par byed @234b do; ;de na de dag gcig gi tshe tshad kyang lo bye ba phrag stong du gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-1: de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba chen po gzhan dang gzhan dag tu tshor ba rnam pa mang po yang myong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-3: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mi bsngags pa brjod pa byas pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-4: yang de'i dus na khyim bdag bde ba zhes bya ba phyug cing nor che ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-6: longs spyod mang ba; bdag dbang ba mang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-16: sa le sbram mang po dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-20: zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi mang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-24: mdzod mang po dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-25: de skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gis chad par lta ba mu stegs can gcer bu pa'i smra ba la bzhag par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-26: de'i chung ma 'od 'phro can zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-30: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-31: de las bu zhig btsas pa yang gzugs bzang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-34: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-35: de btsas ma thag tu lan gsum du 'dzum mul zhes rgod nas bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:234b-36: chad par smra ba'i rigs su skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-1: kyi tshig gi las smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-2: khye'u de'i mas sgra de thos nas dngangs skrag cing mi dga' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-3: spu zing zhes byed nas khye'u de bor te bros pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-4: bud med gzhan 'dus par gyur pa dag kyang byer ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-6: bud med de dag ring zhig tu phyin pa dang slar log ste blta zhing lha'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-21: sh'a ri'i bu; de nas khye'u des bsam pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-22: kye ma'o bud med de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-23: bde ba las bros par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-24: snyam nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-25: nga ni khyod kyi don 'dod kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-27: khyed ni lam ngan zhugs pa las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-28: ngas ni rab tu thar par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-29: khyed rnams de las 'jigs par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-30: dgra rnams kyis ni mdun du bdar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-31: log par lta bar lhung ba las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-32: ngas ni khyed rnams dgrol bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-34: de nas khye'u de'i ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-36: skye bo phal po ches tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas khye'u de ga la ba der dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-37: de nas khye'u des rang gi ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-38: pha la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-39: nor dag dang ni 'bru dag rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-40: khyim na rgya chen yod pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235a-41: myur du bdag la sbyin par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-0: bdag ni @235b sangs rgyas nyan thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-2: rnam gzigs 'jig rten snang mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-3: de 'dra ba ni gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-4: bdag ni de yi nyan thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-5: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-6: chos rnams yang dag rab ston gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-7: rnam gzigs 'jig rten snang mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-8: bdag ni de yi nyan thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-9: gang gi sku la skyes chen gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-10: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-11: rnam gzigs gzigs 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-12: bdag ni de yi nyan thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-13: bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-14: au dum wa ra'i me tog ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-15: yang dag shin tu thos dka' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-16: bdag ni de yi nyan thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-18: khye'u de'i pha dang mas gser bye ba phrag nyi shu byin nas khye'u /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-20: khyod kyi pha ma'i nor yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-21: gang la sems dad par gyur pa de la sbyin pa byin cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-22: ces de skad smras nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-23: 'di ni khyod kyi pha yi nor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-24: 'di ni khyod kyi ma yi nor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-25: gang du sems ni dad par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-26: khye'u yis sbyin pa byin par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-27: dbyig rnams dang ni gser gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-28: khyim 'di na ni yod pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-29: de dag myur du khyer gyis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-30: gang du sems dad der phul cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-31: mal cha dang ni gding ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-32: byug pa phreng ba spos kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-33: dga' bzhin du ni khyer gyis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-34: gang du sems dang dbul byos shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-35: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-36: bla na med pa'i bsod nams zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:235b-37: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-3: de nas khye'u des rang gi pha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-4: ma la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-5: rnam par gzigs pa 'jig rten mgon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-6: de yi drung du bdag mchi ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-7: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-8: shin tu rgyas pa'i mchod pa bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-9: lha rnams dang ni mi dag las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-10: gang dag bde ba 'dod pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-11: bdag ni gang du 'gro ba yi; ;rjes bzhin du ni kun shog cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-13: de nas khye'u des shes bzhin du phyogs bzhir bltas nas rang gi pha ma la kye yab yum /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-15: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de ga la ba der mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-17: de na skye bo mang pos thos nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-18: ji ltar na skyes nas nyin zhag gcig kho na lon pa'i khye'u pha ma la smra zhing rkang gis 'gro ba zhig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236a-19: snyam nas de na srog chags bye ba brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dus par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-0: de nas khye'u de srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par @236b gzigs ga la ba der dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-2: khye'u de 'gro ba na steng gi bar snang las gdugs stong phrag bcu byung nas de dag gis de'i lus bskyabs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-4: nyi mas gnod pa'am gyur par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-5: yang khye'u de 'gro ba na steng gi bar snang las gser gyi dra ba bres par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-6: yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lha'i las kyang 'das pa'i me tog gi char dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-7: phye ma'i char rab tu bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-8: yang khye'u de 'gro ba na bsil ba'i rlung lha'i dri dang ldan pa langs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-9: yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam spos chus btab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-10: yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam gser gyi glegs mas g-yogs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-11: yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam pus mo nub tsam du lha'i me tog chal bar bkram par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-12: yang khye'u de 'gro ba na rdzing bu stong phrag du ma byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-13: rdzing bu de dag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba la me tog autpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-16: padma dkar pos khebs shing ngur pa sgra 'byin par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-17: yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam gyi mu rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu dkrigs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-18: yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lha'i sil snyan mang po 'khrol bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-19: yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam gyi g-yas g-yon rin po ches kun tu brgyan par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-20: yang khye'u de 'gro ba na mdun du me tog gi srang zhig byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:236b-22: bteg pa dang mi snang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-0: de nas khye'u de yud tsam zhig lam du 'phags @237a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-1: te slar bltas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-2: rigs pa mi rigs nam yang mi 'grogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-3: nga lam rgya chen tshul ni gud na yod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-4: khyod ni mi rigs nga ni rigs pa ste; ;rigs pas rgyal ba'i drung du 'gro bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-5: bskal pa khrag khrig mang po 'das kyang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-6: brgya lam dag na mi yi lus thob cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-7: brgya lam dag na sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-8: dad dang shes rab dag kyang brgya lam thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-10: khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu de nas steng gi bar snang las lha bye ba brgyad khri bzhi stong gis legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-12: legs so legs so shes rab che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-13: khyod kyis smras pa mchog yin gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-14: mi rigs rnams ni phyi nas 'ong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-15: grogs po rigs pa khyod bzhud cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-17: de nas khye'u des lha rnams la slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-18: khyod kyis rigs zhes smras pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-19: khyod kyis mi rigs zhes smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-20: rigs pa'i don ni ji lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-21: mi rigs don kyang ji lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-23: de nas lha de dag gis khye'u de la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-24: 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang gnas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-25: de dag mngon byung spyod yul min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-26: de dag mi rigs rmongs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-27: de dag sems can dmyal la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-28: 'dod pa'i longs spyod spangs byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237a-29: khyim med par ni rab byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-0: de dag rigs zhes rab @237b tu bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-2: de nas khye'u des lha de dag la slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-3: ji ltar rigs zhes bya ba de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-4: khyed kyis de ni mi shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-5: ji ltar mi rigs zhes bya ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-6: ngas ni de dag rab tu shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-8: khye'u de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-10: 'jig rten dag gi don phyir spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-11: rigs gsum bdud rtsi rab sbyin pa //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-16: au dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin //
