K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-28: 'di dag la ni chos bstan cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:237b-29: byang chub mchog la dgod du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:238a-0: khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol @238a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:238a-1: nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs chos ston pa de la de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:238a-2: srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:238a-4: bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:238a-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs chos ston pa bzhin du chos ston par gyur cig /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:238a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:238a-18: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:238b-0: de dag gis mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byas nas @238b tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:238b-2: zla ba'i gzi brjid spa bkong nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:239a-5: khyod ni srog chags kun gyi the tshom gcod //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:239a-7: khyod kyis 'das la rtag tu ye shes 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:239a-8: khyod kyis ma 'ongs thams cad rab tu mkhyen; ;sangs rgyas zhing na cung zad ci mchis pa //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:239a-12: 'jig rten mgon po 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:239a-13: rgyu rkyen gang lags bdag ni khyod la zhu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:239a-14: khyod kyis 'dir ni the tshom thams cad chod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:239a-15: khyod ni chos kun la yang the tshom med //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:239a-20: 'dzum pa mdzad 'di rgyu rkyen gang lags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:239a-21: chos rje khyod la bdag ni de zhu 'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:240b-21: bdag ni skyes bu kha lo sgyur //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:241b-21: 'khor ba'i mtha' ma'i mtha' ji tsam par bdag 'khor bar bya'i /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:247b-8: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:247b-9: pha ma la chos kyi bar chad byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:247b-13: sring mo la chos kyi bar chad byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:247b-16: snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams la chos kyi bar chad byed pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248a-3: smad pa'i 'gro ba gang zhe na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-7: de ni sems can slu ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-8: pho brang 'khor gyi bkrabs pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-9: mi dge rtsa ba de dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-10: 'jig rten mgon po mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-11: bdag gis phrogs shig longs shig ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-12: sems can rnams la 'jigs bskyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-13: nyes pa'i las rnams byas gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-14: mi mchog rnams ni mnyes mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-15: dge slong dang ni dge slong ma //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-16: tshul khrims nyams byas sdug bsngal 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-17: sangs rgyas mang po mnyes mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-18: de la dal ba rnyed par dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-19: pha dang ma dang chung ma rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-20: chos spyod pa yi gegs byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-21: myur du chos kyang mi thos shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-22: gti mug gis ni bsgribs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-24: bar du gcod par byas gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-25: sangs rgyas mang po mnyes mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-26: de la dal pa mi 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-27: gang du stong pa nyid bsngags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-28: 'di lta bu yi chos thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-29: khro ba dag ni nyer len cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-30: 'di ni chos min zhes kyang smra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-31: bar chad 'di dag thams cad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-33: dam pa'i chos la smad byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:248b-34: dmus long rab tu sdug bsngal 'gyur //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-2: mthong du zin kyang dad mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-3: bud med ma ning dmus long dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-4: khyi dang bong bu rnams su 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-5: gang zhig sangs rgyas byang chub dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-6: byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dag /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-8: bzang po dag gi lam rnams sgom //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-9: pha dang ma ni chos 'di la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-10: yang dang yang du sbyor ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-11: sems can thams cad rab 'byung bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-12: myur ba nyid du len du bcug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-13: ma ni chos la sbyar byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-15: rab tu 'byung bar bsngags pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-16: myur du byang chub rnam 'tshang rgya //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-19: sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-20: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi brten /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-21: dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang mi 'thob /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-23: sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang rjes su slob par mi 'gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-26: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims la spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-27: dam pa'i chos la smod pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-29: bdag tu lta ba'i thibs po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249a-30: gzhan gyi khyim la phrag dog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-0: @249b rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-1: sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-2: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi brten pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-6: khyi ltogs pa keng rus sha med pa khrag gis 'bags pa blangs nas de srang gi sgo na gnas te kha chus gos pa de 'cha' ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-7: de nas rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-8: bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-9: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu khyi ltogs pa de logs su 'ong ba khyi des rgyang ma nas 'ong ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du bsam ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-11: bdag gi kha zas ro zhim po 'di 'phrog pa zhig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-12: snyam nas de shin tu zugs shing mig tshugs su blta la brang bsnyer te skad cher zugs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-15: skyes bu de keng rus sha med pa khrag gis 'bags pa de 'dod pa yin nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-24: khyi de ci'i phyir shin tu zugs shing mig tshugs su bltal brang bsnyer te skad cher zhugs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:249b-27: bdag gi kha zas ro zhim po 'di 'phrog pa zhig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250a-1: tshugs su blta la brang bsnyer te skad cher zugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250a-4: de bzhin du gang khyim gyi ser sna la brtson pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250a-6: gci bas kun tu bskor ba la chags pa'i dge slong dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250a-16: ser sna byed par mi 'gyur ba lta ci smos /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250a-32: bdag dang sngon 'thams pa zhig yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250a-33: phyi ma 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig ces zer zhing /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-2: bsod snyoms dam bcas par gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-5: yo byad khas blangs par gyur pa rnams sngon ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-6: bdag dang dam bcas par gyur mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-7: phyis 'ongs nas sbyin par mi 'gyur grang snyam nas de de la nyes pa gsum bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-9: gnas la nyes pa bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-12: shes par bya ba ma yin pa shes shing shes par bya ba mi shes la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-13: gang cung zad bsten pa yang mi sten pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-14: de khyim pa la nyes pa bskyed pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-15: de dge slong de gnas gsum brjod par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-17: gnas kyi nyes pa brjod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-18: nyams mi dga' ba brjod cing khyim gtong bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-19: mi bden pa'i gtam zer zhing skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa 'di dag g-yo byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-20: zhes yid rton pa'i sbyor bas dam bca' bar bya ba'i chos yang dag pa rab tu ston pa ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-24: khyim la ser sna byed pa la gnas pa skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gis sdom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-25: sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su btang bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:250b-26: sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su slob par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251a-2: rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251a-5: bskal ba grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251a-8: bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251a-9: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251a-13: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251a-14: de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu'i nyan thos rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251a-15: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251a-18: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag gi bar du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251a-19: yang de'i tshe khyim bdag rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba phyug cing nor che ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251a-20: longs spyod che zhing longs spyod mang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251a-22: nor dang yo byad mang po dang ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251a-32: sa le sbram mang po dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-8: bang ba mang po dang ldan pa zhig byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-9: de'i khye'u de gzugs bzang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-12: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa sdom pa zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-13: sdom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba gnyis byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-14: de gnyis dus gzhan zhig na khang thog tu dong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa de snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs mnabs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-17: lhung bzed bsnams te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer der gshegs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-23: zhi gnas kyi mchog thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-24: shin tu dul zhing zhi gnas kyi mchog thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-25: dbang po dul zhing sbas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-26: glang po ltar rab tu dul ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-27: mtsho ltar dvangs shing thog pa med la gsal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-28: gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-29: sa le sbram gyi ri lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-30: rin po ches yongs su gang ba'i mtsho lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:251b-31: lhas kun nas bskor ba'i brgya byin lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-0: yid rab tu zhi ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par @252a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-1: 'phags mdzes shing dga' bar 'gyur ba de rgyang ma nas byon pa khye'u de gnyis kyis mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-3: de nas gang sdom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzhon nu des dang po nyid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags sngar mthong nas des nu bo de la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-4: sems can gyi rgyal po 'di lta bur mdzes pa nu bo khyod kyis sngon nam yang res 'ga' mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-5: des phu bo la phu bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-6: sems can gyi rgyal po mdzes pa 'di lta bu bdag gis sngon lan 'ga' yang ma mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-7: zhes de skad smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-10: 'di dang 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-13: de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas khye'u sdom pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-14: sdom pa ji ltar mthong ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-15: de 'dra bar ni bdag bsgyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-16: bdag ni de bas mang ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-17: dge slong dge 'dun bsdu bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-18: byang chub kyi ni lam gyi phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-19: zas dang skom ni mi bza' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-20: sdom pa 'di ni rgyal ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-21: bdag ni khyim 'dir dga' ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-22: sems can kun gyi mchog 'di ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-23: skar mang dbus na zla ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-24: mthong na dad par su mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-25: khyim nas mi 'byung su zhig yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252a-27: de nas khye'u sdom pas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-0: tshig tu byas pas @252b mi 'gyur gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-1: sgra bo che ni ma 'byin cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-2: da ni tshig tu mi smra ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-3: 'tshang rgya gang myur shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-5: de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas khye'u sdom pa la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-6: bdag nyid ser sna sems pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-7: zhum pa dag gi lam min te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-8: mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur ro zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-9: bzang po'i sgra ni bdag gis bsgrags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-10: bdag nor shes par mi 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-11: ser sna can gyi rtags yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-12: bdag ni mi smra mi bya ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-13: bdag gtong nor lta ga la zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-15: nga ni byang chub lam phyir 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-16: khyim dang nor ni khyod kyi ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-17: bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-18: sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-20: lta ba nyams pa ma gtogs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-21: byang chub mchog 'di su mi tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-22: khyim dag dang ni nor rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-23: pha dang ma dang gnyen rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-24: bdag gis de dag kun spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-25: sangs rgyas drung du 'gro bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-27: 'jig rten snang mdzad rab tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-28: bskal pa bye ba stong du yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-29: de ni thos par shin tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-30: nam mkha' dag pa'i zla ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-31: sa la lam mer 'dug pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-32: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhugs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-33: dge slong dge 'dun mdun du byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-34: 'od zer stong pa'i nyi ma ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-35: bar snang gnas na lhang nge ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-36: de bzhin sangs rgyas sras dbus na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-37: kun nas rab tu mdzes par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-38: ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:252b-39: rin chen bdag nyid mdzes par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-1: bzhin sangs rgyas mdzes pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-2: dge slong dge 'dun mdun du byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-3: sku yi gzi brjid 'bar ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-5: gzi brjid phung po'i gzugs can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-6: rkang gnyis dam pa de mdzes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-7: lha dang klu dang mi rnams ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-8: rdzu 'phrul dag gis rab sdud cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-9: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhugs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-10: cho 'phrul dag ni rnam par ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-11: sum cu rtsa gnyis bsod nams mtshan mchog ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-12: chos kyi bdag po 'di 'dra mthong nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-13: byis pa ma bslab pa dag ma gtogs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-14: theg pa dman la su zhig 'jug par 'gyur; ;shin tu dkon pa rab tu mdzes byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-15: mi mchog 'di ni bdag gis mthong bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-16: byang chub phyir ni mngon par zhugs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-17: bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du nye bar 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-18: sh'a ri'i bu; de nas khye'u sdom pas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-19: bdag ni le lo'i lam dag nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-20: sangs rgyas drung du mi 'gro ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-21: khang thog 'di nas phyi rol tu; ;bdag gi lus 'di mchong bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-22: bdag tu 'du shes bsal gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-23: srog la blta bar mi bya ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-24: ye shes mchog ni yongs btsal zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-25: sangs rgyas drung du 'gro bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-26: pha la chags dang ma la chags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-27: khyim la chags pa mi bzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-28: de dag thams cad rnam spangs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253a-29: sangs rgyas drung du 'gro bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-0: de ni sangs rgyas dga' @253b ba yin; ;rin po che ni kun spangs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-1: khyim med par ni rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-3: khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-4: khyim gyi skas las babs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags ga la ba der song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-7: khang thog de nas mchong nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa ga la ba der shin tu myur du song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-8: khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa phyi nas song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-10: de nas khye'u sdom pas bcom ldan 'das de la na bza' srang bye ba ri ba phul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-11: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-12: bdag ni gzugs rnams tshol ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-13: sangs rgyas na bza' 'bul ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-14: mi mchog dag ni ci 'dra bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-16: ye shes phung po ldan pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-17: brtson 'grus stobs la rab gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-18: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-19: rkang gnyis dam par 'gyur bar shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-20: stobs bcu rnams dang ldan gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-21: mi 'jigs pa la rab gnas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-24: khyod kyis chos gang mkhyen pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-25: gang la zhugs par lhang nge ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-26: byang chub dam par sangs rgyas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-27: bdag ni chos de ston par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-28: bdag ni gzugs rnams mngon par tshol ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:253b-29: sangs rgyas na bza' mchog 'bul ma lags kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-1: 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-2: byang chub mchog gi zhi ba mngon par tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-3: gnyis su med pa'i chos mchog der gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-4: pha rol rgol ba kun gyis mi g-yos pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-5: chos de nyid ni mngon par 'tshal ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-6: sangs rgyas la ni na bza' mchog phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-7: lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la sman pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-8: gang na skye rgan 'chi ma mchis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-9: mya ngan dang ni smre sngags ma mchis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-10: zhi ba'i chos de bdag ni ston par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-11: gang na 'dod chags zhe sdang ma mchis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-12: gti mug ma mchis sred pa ma mchis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-13: bsil dngos bdud rtsi 'dus ma bgyis pa de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-14: bdag ni byang chub sangs rgyas ston par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-15: gang la khyod zhugs sems can lha klu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-16: de bzhin mi dang sems med dngos po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-17: de ltar sems dang ldan pa rab 'dud pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-18: bdag ni zhi ba'i chos de ston par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-19: gar gnas sangs rgyas zhing du snang ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-20: phyogs bzhi dag na kun tu snang ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-21: mun pa chen por 'od zer phung lta bu'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-22: bsil dngos bdud rtsi de la reg par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-23: 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-24: de bzhin gzugs med khams la rtag mi gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-25: dga' dang mi dga' thams cad rab dben pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254a-26: chos kyi dam pa der ni bdag son shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-0: de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @254b pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags de la shing lham gsar pa bzung gcig phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-1: phul nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-2: sems can rnams kyi gnas rten nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-3: dpung gnyen mgon du 'gyur bar shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-4: ngan pa'i lam du mi mchi zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-5: rtag tu lam rnams ston par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-6: byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-7: 'dod pa nam yang bsten ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-8: 'dus byas dag kyang rab spangs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-9: rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung rnyed gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-10: 'jig rten snang mdzad mthong nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-11: rkang gnyis dam pa mchod par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-12: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-13: byang chub dam pa yongs su btsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-14: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-15: me tog phreng ba spos rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-16: rgyal mtshan dag dang gdugs rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-17: glang po chen po bkur stir bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-18: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir; ;chos gos dag dang bsod snyoms dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-19: mal stan rnams dang gding pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-20: sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-21: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-22: rnga dang dung dang rnga chen dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-23: sil snyan dag dang pi wang gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-24: 'jig rten snang mdzad mchod par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-25: bza' ba dang ni bca' ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-26: dus kyis ma phye bza' ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-27: de dag gis ni 'jig rten mgon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-28: skyob pa bdag gis mchod par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-29: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-30: mchod pa rgya chen bgyis gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-31: de nyid du ni rab byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:254b-32: tshangs par spyod pa bdag gis spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-2: bdag ni lam gol nam yang 'gro ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-3: yan lag brgyad ldan lam mchog rab gnas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-4: bdag gis srog chags bye ba de nyid dgrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-5: dman la 'phags min mchog tu smad pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-6: 'dod pa dag ni nam yang bsten ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-7: bag med thams cad yongs su spangs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-8: bdag ni rtag tu bag yod 'gyur bar shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-9: mi khom brgyad lam nam yang skyes ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-10: rtag tu dad pa'i rigs su skyes gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-11: skyes par gyur nas mi mchog rnams mthong la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-12: mthong nas de la bdag ni dad par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-13: de 'dra'i ye shes de ni btsal ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-14: dang pa'i sems kyis me tog phreng ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-15: byug pa dag dang rdza nga rnga chen dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-16: rnga dang gling bu dag gis ri mor bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-17: bskal pa bye mang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-18: mchod pa chen po dag ni bgyis gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-19: myur du 'dod pa spangs te rab byung la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-20: tshangs par spyad pa bdag ni spyod par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-21: de dag sa phyogs gang du 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la tshigs su bcad pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i sa phyogs der tsandan dmar po las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug lag khang rgyar dpag tshad bzhi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255a-22: 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-0: de dag gis gtsug lag khang de byas nas de bzhin gshegs @255b pa la phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-1: phul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-2: gnas pa gang la khyod ni bzhugs gyur bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-3: sngon gyi rgyal bas bzhi po gang bsngags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-4: gnas pa de ni btsal bar bgyi ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-5: gtsug lag khang 'di bde bar gshegs la dbul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-6: gnas pa dag ni gang la rtag bzhugs na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-7: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-8: sems ni srog chags bye bas mi 'tshal ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-9: spyod pa de ni bdag gis btsal bar bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-10: spyod pa gang dag pha rol son pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-11: yang dag spong dang de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul rkang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-12: mchog bzhi rnams kyi so so yang dag rig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-13: spyod pa de dag bdag gis btsal bar bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-14: de dag gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-15: dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la zla ba phyed kyi bar du bsti stang du byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:255b-19: de dag gis gtsug lag khang der de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la bsti stang du byas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-0: sngon ni spun @260b du gyur pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-1: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myur bsgrub cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-2: de na bdag cag dam bcas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-3: ngas ni byang chub thob gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-4: tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-5: khyod ni khyim dang chung ma dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-6: rtag tu srung zhing gnas pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-7: mkhas pa rnams ni 'di la yid mi rton //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-8: 'dod pa 'di dag ngan zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-9: skye bo dag ni bag med don spyod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-10: de phyir don min rtag tu rnam par spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-11: blo gros ngan pa don med khur khyer te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-12: khyod ni don med pa la rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-13: 'phags pa dag gis 'byung bar rab tu bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-14: 'dod yon sdug bsngal thob byed mi shes so; ;bcom ldan 'das des tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis de bskul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-16: chung ma la yang ma bltas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-24: rgyal srid thams cad la yang ma bltas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-25: nor bu'i phung po thams cad la yang ma chags par stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-26: sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-27: bdag gi sha yang bskam par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-28: khyim kun kyang ni spang bar bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-29: dgon par mchis nas 'gum par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-30: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-31: khyim med par ni rab byung nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-32: dgon pa rab dgon sten bgyid cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:260b-33: phyir yang brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-2: 'dod pa'i phyir yang mi sten te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-3: de la gnas par gyur bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-4: bdag ni rgyab kyis phyogs bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-5: 'dod dang longs spyod rgyal srid dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-6: thams cad rnam par spangs gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-7: 'jig rten mgon gyi bstan pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-8: deng nyid bdag ni rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-9: byang chub phyir ni spyad pa spyod byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-10: mkhas pa su zhig 'dus byas yid rton byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-11: gang du bdag ni 'dod la zhugs gyur pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-12: brtson 'grus brtsams kyang byang chub reg ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-13: de bas 'dod pa'i yon tan bdag spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-14: longs spyod bde dang rgyal srid bde spangs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-15: rgyal ba'i bstan la ched du rab byung la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-16: byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-17: des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi drung du skra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-18: kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-19: rgyal po mngon par byung zhing rab tu byung bar shes nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel la mchod pa byas nas de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i rgyal por skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-0: de dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas bskal pa de nyid la bla na med pa yang @261b dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs spyod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-2: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-3: de lo bye ba tshang bar gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-4: de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba khrag khrig tshang ba'i nyan thos chen po 'dus par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-5: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-6: zag pa zad pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag gi bar du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du bkod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-8: chos bstan nas sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don byas te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-9: de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-10: bskal pa las lhag par gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-11: de'i ring bsrel yang rgyas par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-13: dper na; nga da yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ring bsrel rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-16: byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas pa'i rjes su byang chub sems dpa' bslab cing brtson 'grus ma nyams par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad par bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:261b-17: sems can keng rus la gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-0: ser sna la gnas pa dag gi @262a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-1: rjes su bslab par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-3: byang chub sems dpa' gang la la byang chub 'dod la gzhan gyi khyim la ser sna bskyed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-4: de'i tshe de la 'jigs pa gsum 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-6: gzhan gyi khyim dag tu kha zas kyi phyir smra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-7: kun tu smra ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i dge slong gzhan mthong na phrag dog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-8: ser sna bskyed cing khong khro ba'i sems gcig tsam gyis kyang mi mthun par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-9: des sems can dmyal ba'i lam yongs su bzung bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-10: dmus long gi sa bon btab bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-11: mtha' 'khob tu skye ba'i gnas yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-13: gang la las 'phags pa'i dge slong mthong na khro ba'i zil gyis non te khro ba'i sems kyis mi smra zhing ser sna bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-14: khong khro ba'i sems gcig tsam gyis kyang mi mthun par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-15: des sems can dmyal ba'i lam yongs su bzung bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-16: dmus long gi sa bon btab par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-17: mir skyes na yang mtha' 'khob kyi mi'i yul phyogs su skye ba'i gnas yongs su bzung bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-20: gzhan gyi dring 'jog cing skur pa mang bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-22: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi khyim la phrag dog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262a-23: ser sna skyes pa de'i tshe de dag 'jigs pa 'di gsum yid la bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-0: de skad @262b ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-2: byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag la de ltar rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa khyim gyi ser sna las byung ba 'di lta bu bshad pa ngo mtshar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-5: bdag cag nyan thos rnams la yang khyim gyi ser sna las 'byung ba legs par bshad du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-7: bdag cag kyang sems can dmyal ba las thar par 'tshal ba lags kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-8: bdag cag dmus long 'tshal ba ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-9: bdag cag gcugs ma mchis pa'i 'khon mi 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-10: bdag cag kyang skur pa 'debs pa 'tshal ba ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-11: bdag cag mtha' 'khob kyi gnas 'tshal ba ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-13: bdag cag ni; yul gyi dbus kyi phyogs 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-14: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-15: chos nyan pa yongs su ma btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-16: de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-18: khyod 'di ltar gnam zhing drang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-19: gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:262b-24: gang 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob par 'dod pa de dag gi phyir bshad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-1: 'thab pa'i rtsa ba rtsod par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-5: dad ba mang zhing sems can rnams kyi skyabs kyi phyir yun ring por blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-6: dus ring por blta bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song nas yongs su 'dri bar byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-8: de 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-10: mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-11: nan tan gyis kyang sgrub mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-13: gang lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa'i sems can de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-15: phal cher dngos po gsum la gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-19: tshigs su bcad pa tshol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-20: mdza' bo'i khyim dang slong ba'i khyim tshol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-21: gnas yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyug pa tshol te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-22: dngos po gsum po 'di dag la gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-24: gang dngos po 'di gsum la gnas pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-25: ngan song gsum las yongs su mi thar ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-26: de dag sems can dmyal ba las thar pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-28: gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar par bya ba la spro ba chung zhing de dag mtho ris zad par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263a-33: 'gyed pa la brtson zhing lta bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-0: de dag ma dad par gyur pas mdza' ba mang pos @263b yongs su zin nas dgon par gnas pa spong ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-1: de dag la khyim pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-2: tshe dang ldan pa khyod nged kyi gnas dang nye bar gnas par gyis shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-7: yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-8: tshe dang ldan pa dgon pa la gnas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-9: nged kyis kyang khyod mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-10: khyod kyis kyang nged mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-12: de dag phan tshun smra ba mang bas gnas la chags nas mngon par dga' ba bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-13: de dag gnas la sred pa bskyed par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-16: slong ba sbyin pa'i khyim mang bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-17: de dag phyi phyir zhing mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-18: gcig la gcig sred par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-19: de la gang dge slong thor bur 'ongs pa de dag la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-20: mang du thos pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-21: rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-23: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-25: dgra bcom pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-27: gzhan la bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ba la spro bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-29: de la khyim pa de dag gang dge slong thor bur 'ongs pa de dag ni; bdag cag gi drung na yun ring du gnas pa ma yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-30: gang dge slong 'khod pa dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-31: bdag cag gcig gi gcig don gyi pho nya yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:263b-32: zhes pa 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-1: dag gcig la gcig ser sna byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-4: chos 'di lta bu khong du chud par ma gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-6: khong du chud par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-7: de dag thams cad mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spangs par gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-11: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu'i tshig dang 'bru'i rnam grangs thos nas thos ma thag tu mos par mi byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-12: sems can ngan song du 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-15: de la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-17: phrag dog gi gzhi 'di lta bu ngan song du 'gro ba'i las thos nas khyim gyi ser sna ma byed pa yang mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-18: khyim gyi ser sna byas pa yang 'chags par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-21: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-23: brtson 'grus ma nyams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na sems can thams cad la nad par 'du shes bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-24: sems can de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-25: gdung ba'i nad 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264a-29: zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-1: rtsi bsku ba'i sbyor ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-2: zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-3: gti mug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-4: rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba dag gis bsdu bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-5: zhes de ltar sems shing de chos kyi sman dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-6: rtsis bskus pa'i sbyor ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-7: zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-8: gti mug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-9: rtsis bskus pa'i sbyin pa sdud par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-11: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-15: gdung ba'i nad gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs nas na ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-18: zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-20: sems can gang sems can dmyal bar skye ba de dag kyang gdung ba 'di gsum gyi rtag tu gdungs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-22: zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-24: gang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-25: gang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-27: gang lhar skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:264b-28: zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:265a-0: gti mug gi gdung ba 'di gsum gyis rtag @265a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:265a-2: gang sems can de dag gi sman pa gso bar byed pa de dag kyang gang 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:265a-3: zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:265a-4: gti mug gi gdung ba 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:265a-5: de la sman pa gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:265a-6: sman gzhan bsku ba'i sbyor bas sems can de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:265a-7: zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267a-11: ngas mngon par shes pa bskal pa grangs med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan ma thag tu ngas chos kyi sku @267b thob par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-1: nga chos kyi sku dang ldan par gyur nas mar me mdzad kyi 'og tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig mdzes zhes bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi bdag po rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-2: mthu che ba; dbang che bar grags par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-3: yang de'i tshe dzambu'i gling 'dir grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong phrag bzhi byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-6: ri khrod stong phrag mang po byung ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-10: yang de'i tshe nad chen po'i bskal pa bar ma byung ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-19: bad kan gyis rgyas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-20: de na sman pa brgya stong phrag mang po sems can de dag gi nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-22: de nas sems can de dag gso ba ma rnyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-24: skyabs med nas sgra cher phyung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-25: lha dag dang ni klu rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-26: gnod sbyin dri za srin po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-27: mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-28: bdag cag nas las thar byed gang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-29: bdag cag sdug bsngal thar byed la; ;nor rnams thams cad sbyin par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-30: de yi bka' yi rjes su 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:267b-31: byas pa bdag kyang gzo bar bya ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-1: lha'i mig rnam par dag pas sems can de dag nad kyis gzir te de dag phal cher lus rma can du gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-9: bad kan gyis brgyal bar mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-10: mi'i las 'das pa lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pas sems can de dag gi sgra cher phyung ba thos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-11: mthong zhing thos nas sems can de dag la snying rje chen po skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-12: de dag la ngas 'di snyam du bsam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-13: nga sems can 'di dag gi gnas su gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-14: sems can skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-15: sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-16: sems can gso ba med pa rnams kyi gso ba sbyar bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-19: ngas brgya byin gyi lus chen po mi snang bar byas nas grong khyer chen po ku ru nas shin tu mi ring ba zhig tu des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags shig tu rdzus te skyes nas steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-20: 'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-21: grong khyer ku ru nas ni mi ring na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-22: des pa zhes bya'i srog chags rnam pa yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-23: gang dag de yi sha la yongs za ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-24: de kun nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-25: 'jigs shing skrag pa dag par tu ma byed par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268a-26: de yi sha ni ji ltar 'dod dag longs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-0: @268b de ni gnod par mi sems khro gshe med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-1: de ni dzambu'i gling gi rtsi yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-3: grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong phrag bzhi po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-7: ri khrod stong pa de dag na sems can na ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis sgra de thos nas grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba ga la ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-8: srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa gang na yod pa der song ste phyin nas srog chags des pa zhes bya ba'i lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus las sha yongs su zad par ma gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-9: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-10: gang phyir bden pas byang chub reg 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-11: ye shes phung po de zad mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-12: nga yi tshig de bden par 'gyur zhe na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-13: lus la sha ni nam yang zad ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-15: dzam bu'i gling kun gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags kyis sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus la bri ba'am gang bar yang mi mngon te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-16: de yang bcad yang bcad kyang slar de bzhin du skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-18: gang sems can na ba rnams kyis des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags kyi sha zos na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-19: de dag gi nad thams cad byang ste nad med cing bde ba las mi 'gyur bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:268b-20: de bzhin du mthar gyis dzambu'i gling na na ba thams cad kyi nad sna tshogs byang ste nad med par byas nas bde zhing 'gyur ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-5: mi thams cad 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-6: des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags des bdag cag nad las yongs su thar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-7: bde zhing 'gyur ba med par byas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-8: bdag cag gis de la mchod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-9: bkur sti ci zhig bya snyam ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-10: de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-11: 'dus nas des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags ga la ba der song ste phyin nas srog chags des pa la 'khor yug tu bskor te slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-12: khyod ni gnas dang skyabs lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-13: khyod ni sman pa khyod nyid sman //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-14: khyod la mchod pa ci bgyi ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-15: bdag cag la ni bka' stsol cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-17: ae ma'o skye bo'i tshogs rnams 'dun par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-18: snyam du ngas shes nas lus chen po de mi snang bar byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-19: rang gi brgya byin gyi cha byad du 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-24: yul dang; rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor mi dgos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-26: nga la zhing gi dngos po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-31: nor bu dang; mu tig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-35: byi ru rnams mi dgos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269a-37: nga la glang po che dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-10: zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyang mi dgos so; ;bza' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-16: dka' thub kyi nags tshal gyi longs spyod rnams kyang mi dgos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-18: khyed kyis srog gcod pa srongs la srog gcod pa las slar ldog par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-19: ma byin par len pa spongs la ma byin par len pa las slar ldog par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-20: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spongs la 'dod pas log par g-yem pa las slar ldog par gyis shig //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-21: brdzun du smra ba spongs la brdzun du smra ba las slar ldog par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-22: phra ma spongs la phra ma las slar ldog par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-23: de bzhin du sbyar te ngag rtsub po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-27: log par lta ba'i bar du spongs la log par lta ba las slar ldog par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-28: de'i tshe skye bo'i tshogs chen po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-29: nga la 'gron bu bye ba mi dgos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-30: gser phung ri rab tsam yang dgos pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-31: bud med lha mo 'dra ba mi dgos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-32: bza' dang btung dang kha zas mi dgos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-33: des pa'i srog chags la ni mchod 'dod na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:269b-34: las kyi lam ni rab dag bcu po 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-0: thams cad 'dus nas de dag srung bar @270a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-1: gyis; ;phan tshun du yang byams pa'i yid kyis ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-2: las lam bcu po rdzogs pa 'di dag rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-3: thams cad gcig tu 'dus te srungs shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-4: de tshe nga la mchod pa byas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-5: byang chub sems dpa' nor dang 'bru mi tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-6: nga la nor rnams dgos pa ma yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-7: bza' btung dag dang dbyig nor 'bru mi dgos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-8: rta dang glang chen shing rta mi dgos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-9: bud med mchog dang rin chen gos mi dgos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-10: phan tshun du ni byams sems dag pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-11: phan pa'i dngos po dag gi sems bskyed la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-12: thams cad kun kyang gcig tu 'dus gyur la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-13: dge bcu'i las lam dag rdzogs srung bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-14: dbang pos mi rnams de dag rab bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-15: tshig de dag ni thos par gyur pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-16: dge ba bcu yi las lam rnam dag pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-17: dge ba rnams ni yang dag rab tu len /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-19: ngas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag la chos kyi gtam kun tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-22: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270a-25: ngas mngon par shes te 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-0: mi de snyed thams cad kyis srog chags nges pa zhes bya ba'i sha zos pa las tha na sems @270b can gcig kyang de na 'chi ba'i dus byas te de nas shi 'phos nas log par ltung bar song bar ma gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-1: de dag thams cad de nas shi 'phos te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba ma mnyam par skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-3: ngas de dag la chos kyi gtam kun tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-6: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-8: bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang theg pa gsum la nges par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-12: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-14: ngas de ltar lus gcig yongs su btang bas sems can de snyed theg pa gsum dag la yongs su smin par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po ci 'dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-16: mthu chen po ci 'dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-17: dbang che bar grags pa ci 'dra ba la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-18: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-19: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-21: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sku de ci 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:270b-24: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sku ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271a-4: sku tha dad pas 'dul ba sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis tha dad du 'gyur yang mes mi tshig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271a-6: rdo rje lta bur brtan pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271a-11: lus kyi sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems pa med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271a-13: lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so; ;lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid rjes su shes la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271a-14: lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid la gnyis su yang mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271a-15: mtshan nyid gang lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i mtshan nyid de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271a-16: chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid des dben pa'i mtshan nyid gcig gis rjes su 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271a-17: nang gi chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir rang gi lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mnyam par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271a-18: de sems can thams cad kyi lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rjes su shes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-0: chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang chos thams cad dben pa'i @271b mtshan nyid kyis rjes su slob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-1: de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-2: de sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-3: rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-4: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-5: rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-7: rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-9: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-12: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-13: 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-14: 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-15: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:271b-17: 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-1: de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-2: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-3: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-4: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-5: 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-6: yang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-8: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid phung po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-10: skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-13: skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-14: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-15: rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-16: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-17: rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-20: mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid mngon par 'du byed pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-21: mngon par 'du byed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'du byed thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de nyid yin te; yang sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-22: de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272a-25: gzhan ma yin pa nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-0: lus gang yang @272b med de; lus med pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-4: de bzhin nyid kyi lus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-5: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus zhes bya'o; ;lus de lta bu ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-8: byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad kyang ston pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyang mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-9: lus med pa rtsod pa med pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-10: gzugs kyi lus thams cad kyang ston pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyang 'khrugs par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-11: de bzhin gshegs ba'i ye shes kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la so sor rtog ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang rang gi lus mnyam pa nyid so sor rtog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-13: rang gi lus mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang lus med pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-14: lus dang lus med pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis shin tu lus med pa'i lus su mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-15: lus thams cad rten cing 'brel te 'byung bar yang shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-16: shes nas kyang chos kyi sku mngon par sgrub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-17: chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrubs nas chos kyi sku nyid yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-22: de chos kyi sku rab tu phye bas mthong bas kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-23: thos pas kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-24: reg pas kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:272b-25: sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-4: sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed kyis rtsi thams can bsdus nas rtsi shing mang po sbyar ba las bu mo gzugs bzang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-7: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa shin tu rdzogs par zin pa byi dor byas pa zhig byas nas der 'ong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-11: nyal bar byed kyang mi rtog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-12: rnam par mi rtog mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-13: bya ba de dag kyang ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-16: rgyal po'i blon po chen po'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-19: mkhar gyi rgyal po yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-20: gang na ba chen po che ba de dag 'ongs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-21: de dag la sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi sman gyi bu mo de dang sprad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-22: phrad ma thag tu nad thams cad thub par 'gyur; mi na bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-23: 'gyur ba med cing bde bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-25: de ltar sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'jig rten gyi nad gso ba shes pa de ltar sman pa gzhan dag la med do; ;sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-26: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi skus che ba yang 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-27: byang chub sems dpa'i lus la skyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-30: bu mo sems can ji snyed 'dod chags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273a-32: gti mug gis gdungs pa rnams kyis reg na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-0: de dag reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam shin tu yongs su @273b dag pas nad thams cad byang zhing gdung ba yang med par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-2: yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi lus can gyi lus ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-4: skom gyis gso ba ma yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-5: zas kham gyi za bas lus gso ba ma yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-6: de kha zas thams cad yongs su shes pas sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-7: de zas za yang gtong bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-8: zas za yang lus kyi nang du gtong bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-9: chos kyi sku'i stobs las kyang mi nyams /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-12: yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi lus can la tshe dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-15: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'chi 'pho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-17: de 'chi 'pho yang chos thams cad 'chi 'pho med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-18: mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin par rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-19: skye yang chos thams cad 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-20: 'byung yang chos thams cad skye ba med par rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-24: chos la rton pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sngon gyi smon lam lhun gyis grub pas brtson 'grus ma nyams par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:273b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-0: de dag lus ni rdo rje @274a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-2: 'dul ba'i dus shes nas ni tha dad ston par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-3: mtshon gyis mi tshugs mes ni tshig pa ma yin yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-4: 'dul ba'i sems can mthong na tshugs shing mes tshig 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-5: sems can na ba mthong na sman rnams su yang 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-6: de bzhin bkres pa rnams la zas dang skom du 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-7: 'on kyang chos kyi dbyings la rnam rtog ci yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-8: chos kyi sku dang lus med tshul gcig rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-9: shed las skyes dang gso dang shed can yod min te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-10: chos so cog ni rten cing 'brel te byung bar shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-11: gang de'i skyon yod pa na sdug bsngal lam 'byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-12: rkyen med pa na sdug bsngal lam ni chad par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-13: gzugs ni lbu ba rdos pa 'dra ste snying po med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-14: tshor ba chu yi chu bur mtshungs shing 'dra bar sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-15: 'du shes dpyid kyi dus kyi smig rgyu rgyu ba 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-16: 'du byed rnams ni chu skyes shing dang 'dra bar blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-17: ji ltar gar la blta bar sgyu ma bslab pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-18: skad cig gis ni gzugs rnams sna tshogs ston byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-19: mi bden byed pa de ltar rnam shes shes gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-20: mkhas pa de dag thams cad du yang smon pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-21: longs spyod rnams ni ri gzar chu dang mtshungs shing 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274a-22: glog dang mkha' sprin phung po lta bur byung nas med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-0: longs spyod @274b 'gyur ba gzhu drag 'phangs pa'i mda' ltar shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-1: mkhas pa rnams ni kun tu longs spyod smon pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-2: lha yi 'jig rten lha rdzas bde ba ma myong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-3: 'jig rten gsum po dag na sems can gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-4: slar yang sems dmyal sdug bsngal myong ba mthong gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-5: bde gshegs sras pos de mthong mtho ris 'gro mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-6: yid ni nam mkha' 'dra ba de dag gnas med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-7: gnas dang bral ba rnams la 'byung ba srid ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-8: 'byung ba med rnams skye dang 'chi 'pho med par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-9: byang chub sems dpa' che ba mi rga mi 'chi 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-11: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'di ltar slob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-14: gang 'dod chags nad chen por rab tu mi shes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-15: zhe sdang nad chen por rab tu mi shes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-16: gti mug nad chen por rab tu mi shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-17: gsum po 'di dag nad chen por mi shes pa'i sman pa mi mkhas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-18: sman pa mi mkhas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas nad chen po gsum po de dag gi sman gsum mi shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-19: 'dod chags kyi nad chen po'i sman chen po mi gtsang ba yin par rab tu mi shes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:274b-20: zhe sdang gi nad chen po'i sman chen po byams pa yin par rab tu mi shes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:275a-1: mug gi nad chen po'i sman chen po rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba yin par rab tu mi shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:275a-2: kye ma'o sman pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:275a-7: kye ma'o sman pa de dag gi sman de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:275a-8: re zhig gso nus pa yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:275a-9: gtan du gso bar byed pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:275a-10: de bas na; bdag cag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:275a-11: sman pa de dag gi rjes su bslab par mi bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:275a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mkhas pa bla na med pa sman pa'i rgyal po chen po nad thams cad gso bar byed pa de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:275a-15: nad thams cad gso bar bya'i /
