K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:280b-11: de ltar chos ston pa'i dge slong de nas shi 'phos te shi ba'i dus byas nas shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:280b-13: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:280b-15: lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i srog chags bye ba phrag drug cur tshang ba theg pa gsum dag la yongs su smin par byas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:280b-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes ma thag tu mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa dang ldan par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:280b-18: de de na tshe ji tsam thub par 'dug nas de nas shi 'phos te shi ba'i dus byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281a-0: de sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skyes te gang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padma'i bla ma byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der rgyal rigs @281a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281a-2: sngon yongs su smin par byas pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag kyang de nyid du skyes nas de'i g-yog tu gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281a-3: de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu mthor gshegs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs de tshe'i tshad lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu thub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281a-6: de'i tshe na mi de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyang lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu thub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu mthor gshegs kyi nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa sha stag 'dus pa byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281a-9: lo bye ba re re zhing nyan thos 'dus pa re re byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281a-10: nyan thos 'dus pa re re la nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad cu byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281a-12: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bu gzhon nu dpa' bas byin zhes bya ba mang du thos pa yid gzhungs pa de'i rgyus dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281b-0: gzhon nu de g-yog dang bcas pa srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cus bskor te mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu mthor @281b gshegs de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281b-1: gzhon nu dpa' bas byin g-yog dang bcas pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281b-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs des gzhon nu dpa' bas byin de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas sngon byung ba dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par rab tu bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281b-6: rgyal bu gzhon nu dpa' bas byin de sngon byung ba dang ldan pa'i gtam de thos nas dad pa rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281b-7: de sems dad par gyur nas srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag dang lhan cig tu dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281b-8: de de na tshe ji tsam thub par byang chub tshol zhing tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281b-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs des dge slong dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bas byin 'di nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:281b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan @282a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282a-1: to; ;bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel la des mchod pa byas te dam pa'i chos kyang yang dag par bzung nas de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po'i tshe'i tshad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282a-5: bskal pa phyed thub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282a-6: de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dpag tu med pa zhig byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282a-7: de'i nyan thos 'dus pa re re la yang khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282a-10: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282a-11: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mang du thos te bzungs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282a-14: kun chub par byas pas mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ba'i bar du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282b-0: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i brtson 'grus ma nyams pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod @282b kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282b-1: gzung bar bya ba nas rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i bar du bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol ba la brtson 'grus ma nyams pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282b-10: de la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282b-11: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282b-14: de la gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson na byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282b-16: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa rnams las dben pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282b-17: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282b-20: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:282b-21: sh'a ri'i bu; gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rtog pa dang dpyod pa nye bar zhi zhing nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283a-1: las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283a-3: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283a-4: bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283a-6: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283a-8: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bde ba yang spangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283a-9: snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283a-10: sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283a-11: de de ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283a-15: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur nas ting nge 'dzin kyang mi gtong la bsam gtan gyi las kyang byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283a-16: de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi las gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283a-17: gang mngon par shes pa dang ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283a-18: de la mngon par shes pa gang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-0: mngon par shes pa zhes @283b bya ba ni; 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-3: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-5: rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon sum du bya bar mngon par shes pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-6: 'di dag ni; mngon par shes pa lnga zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-8: de la byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gis mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-10: mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-13: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-15: yongs su byang ba; nyon mongs pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-16: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir sems 'jug par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-17: de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-18: mi las shin tu 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-27: lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-28: ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:283b-29: yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa; 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-0: de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log @284a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-1: par ltung ba'i sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-3: lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-4: ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-5: yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-6: 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-7: yang dag par lta ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-8: de dag yang dag par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-9: zhes sems can rnams kyi las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-10: de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi las ji ltar bsags pa shin tu rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-12: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-13: gzugs su snang ba thams cad la sgrib pa med pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-14: gang klu thams cad kyi lha'i mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-17: lha ma yin thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-19: dgra bcom pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284a-20: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i mig de bas lha'i mig gang shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-0: nges par 'byung ba'i las thams cad kyis nges par byung ba'i lha'i @284b mig la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa na rags pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-5: gang nye ba thams cad snang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-6: de'i lha'i mig gis shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-9: de'i lha'i mig des gzugs med pa na spyod pa ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na sems can gang dag 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-10: skye ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-11: de dag gi las kyi rgyu yang rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-12: de dag gi las kyi 'bras bu yang rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-13: de dag gi dbang po rnams kyang rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-14: dbang po'i rgyu yang rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-15: dbang po'i rim pa yang rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-16: gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhing gi bkod pa de dag thams cad kyang mngon sum du mthong bas mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-17: mthong nas kyang tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-18: tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa de'i bsngo ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:284b-19: de'i lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las shin tu 'das pa des gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag thams cad kyang mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-1: nas kyang gang skyes bu dam pa de dag gi cho ga dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-7: chos kyi rnam par thar pa'i ye shes la gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-8: gzungs thob pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-11: thabs mkhas pa la 'jug pa de thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-13: gzugs thams cad mthong bas sgrib pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-15: gzugs thams cad la mi chags pas chags pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-17: bag la nyal dang lta ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-19: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas rnam par dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-21: yul thams cad la mi gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-23: nyon mongs pa dang bag la nyal ba rnams mi len pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-25: the tshom med pas rab rim med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-27: sgrib pa med pa'i chos rnams la kun nas ldang ba med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-29: chos snang ba rnams la chos snang ba thob pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-31: rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285a-33: de'i mig de ni; nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gos pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-0: 'phags pa'i rnam pa'i dbang po rnams kyis nges par 'byed pa'i cha @285b dang mthun pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-2: sems can thams cad la 'od zer mnyam par gtong bas khong khro ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-4: sems kyi 'khrug pa dang bral bas rnam par dag pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-6: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas dri ma med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-8: bsam pa mi 'dor bas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'o; ;de'i mig de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-10: khong khro ba dang bral bas chags pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-16: sems can la snying rje chen po rlabs po cher gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-18: slong ba rnams la khong khro ba med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-20: tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la khong khro ba med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-22: gnod par sems pa rnams la rjes su bsrungs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-24: le lo can rnams la rab tu bzung ba ster ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-26: sems 'khrugs pa rnams la bsam gtan gyi yan lag ston pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-28: shes rab 'chal pa rnams la shes rab kyi mig sbyin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-30: lam nor bar zhugs pa rnams la lam ston pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:285b-32: mos pa chung ba rnams la sangs rgyas rgya chen por ston pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-0: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya chen pos mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par shes @286a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-1: pa byang chub kyi snying por mngon par byang chub kyi snying po la gzhol ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-6: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-9: ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-12: de la byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-13: mi las shin tu 'das pas mi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-14: mi ma yin pa gnyi ga'i sgra yang thos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-15: de phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na gang la la sgrar grags pa lha'i sgra'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-23: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i sgra'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-28: nyan thos kyi sgra yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-29: de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' de'i lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis rig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:286a-30: gang yang ngan song gi sgra'am /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:302a-0: de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems @302a *//

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:302b-3: ye shes sgron dang de bzhin mi gtsang dang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:302b-7: smon med ting 'dzin de bzhin zhi ba'i sa //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:302b-9: rab dul klu dbang stag ces bya ba dang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:302b-20: legs byas byas pa chud mi za ba dang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:351a-0: @351a *// byang chub sems dpa' yan lag lnga la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:353b-5: 'dus byas la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:353b-6: gang yang stong pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:353b-8: smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la 'dris par bya ba shes shing mngon sum du mkhas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:353b-9: byang chub tu gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing 'dus ma byas kyang mngon du mi byed pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:353b-11: gzhan yang khams gsum na spyod kyang khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi gos pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:353b-13: gang yang khams gsum las 'byung ba'i ye shes rab tu shes kyang 'byung ba'i khams su mi ltung ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:353b-15: gang chos thams cad la mkhas pa zhes bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:353b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:353b-17: gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:353b-18: shes rab dang mkhas pa med na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:353b-20: de'i phyir chos thams cad la mkhas pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-0: byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad @354a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-1: la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la gnas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-5: shes rab rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-6: mkhas pa bcu po de dag la yang mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pha la spyod do; ;de la shes rab ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-8: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-10: shes rab ces bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-12: mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-14: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i chos rnams kyi mngon sum mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-15: 'phags pa'i chos mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir tshad mar gyur pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-17: chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir tshad mar gyur pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-19: lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-22: sgrib par byed pa'i chos rnams rab tu rtogs pa'o; ;shes rab ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-25: smon lam thams cad kyi smon lam dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-28: shin tu sbyangs pa'i phyir sim par byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-29: shes rab ni; chos kyi dga' ba la dmigs pa rnam par mi gcod pa'i phyir rab tu dga' bar byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354a-31: ye shes thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir rten pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-0: shes @354b rab ni; byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-2: theg pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi 'bras bu rtogs pa'i phyir thob pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-4: rang bzhin gyis ye shes snang ba rab tu shes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-6: chu bo thams cad las sgrol ba'i phyir rab tu sgrol ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-8: yang dag par gyur pa la 'dren pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-10: dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-12: nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal thams cad dang bar byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-14: chos thams cad kyi spyi bo thob pa'i mchog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-16: rang byung ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la dam pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-18: khams gsum dang ma 'dres pas rgyu dang bral ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-20: 'phags pa thams cad kyis shin tu bzung ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-22: mtshan mar yongs su rtog pa thams cad spangs pas smon lam rnam par chad pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-24: mun pa mun nag dang bral bas bag med pa'i gnyen po'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-26: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-28: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi lam la gnas pa rnams kyi rab tu 'dren pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:354b-30: ma rig pa'i rlung gi mun pa rab rib kyi sprin 'joms par byed pas snang bar byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-0: mig la ji ltar mos pa rnams @355a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-1: kyi mig thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-3: ming dang gzugs kyi lam las 'das pa'i phyir zag pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-5: dben pa las byung ba don dam pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-7: shin tu dul ba'i phyir mi 'khrugs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-9: ye shes kyi sgo'i snang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-11: thams cad rgyu ba mi zad pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-12: shes rab ni; rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug par mthong ba'i phyir 'gal pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-14: len pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcod par byed pas thar pa'i lam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-16: sgrib par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pas ma 'dres pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-19: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi las dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-20: ye shes kyi spyod pa yang de snyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-21: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-22: ye shes kyang de snyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-23: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgo ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab la 'jug pa'i sgo yang de snyed do; ;nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355a-25: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa shes rab gnas pa'i gnas kyang de snyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-0: byang chub @355b sems dpas thams cad la bslab par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-3: de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-4: shes rab gang yin pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i don kyang de yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-5: dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-6: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-7: gong ma bzhin du sbyar te pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshig kyang de bzhin du dpyad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-8: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-9: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-10: gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-11: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-12: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos la mngon par ma chags pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-14: 'khor ba'i nyes pa khong du chud pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-15: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-16: zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi mdzod ston pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-18: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-19: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-20: sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-25: shes rab mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-26: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-27: rnam par nges pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-28: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-29: sems can thams cad kyi khams la 'jug pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:355b-30: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-1: skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-2: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-3: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-4: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to; ;sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-5: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-6: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-8: byang chub kyi snying po yang dag par thob pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-10: bdud thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-11: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-13: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-14: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gzhog par byed pa'i don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-15: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-16: sh'a ri'i bu; byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bslab na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-17: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-20: theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang bar bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-23: gzhan la yang bshad par bya; rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356a-26: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-2: rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-3: yon tan bcu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-6: tshe rabs gzhan du 'phos nas bzo'i gnas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-7: las kyi gnas thams cad la rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-12: lha dang mi rnams la phangs par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-13: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-15: thams cad du byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-16: yon tan gyi phan yon 'di bcu thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-17: de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-20: gcer bu pa'i rtsod pa dang 'dres pa ma yin par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-21: bdag tu mi lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-22: sems can du mi lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-23: srog tu mi lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-24: gang zag tu mi lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-25: chad par mi lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-26: rtag par mi lta bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-27: dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-28: rab tu 'byung ba la dga' bar sems bskyed pa 'thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-29: thos pa'i tshig 'bru myur du khong du chud par 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-30: yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:356b-31: de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-0: dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba @357a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-2: blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-3: rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-4: mos pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-5: shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-6: dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-7: tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-8: rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ste 'dod chags bdo ba ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-9: de shin tu 'dod chags kyi gdung bas yongs su mi gdung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-10: rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang chung ste zhe sdang bdo ba ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-11: de shin tu zhe sdang gi gdung bas yongs su mi gdung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-12: rang bzhin gyis gti mug chung ste gti mug bdo ba ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-13: de shin tu gti mug gi gdung bas yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-14: yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-15: de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong zhing mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul bzhin gyi zhu ba yongs su zhu zhing tshul bzhin du zhu ba zhus @357b nas lan ldon par 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-1: yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-2: de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-5: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mnyes par byas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-6: bdud kyi bcings pa thams cad lhod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-7: des bdud thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-8: nyon mongs pa thams cad smad par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-9: 'du byed thams cad du gtogs pa las yid bskyod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-10: 'gro ba ngan par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-11: mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam mngon du 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-12: 'khor ba thams cad las sgrol ba'i sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi cho ga'i rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bka'i rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-15: yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-22: gzhan la yang bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:357b-23: yon tan gyi phan yon 'di snyed thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad @358a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-2: gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-3: mkhas pa de dag shes rab mtha' yas 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-4: chos dang don rnams la yang mkhas par 'gyur; ;tshig kyang khyad par 'phags shing yi ge rdzogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-5: gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-6: de ni rab dga' shin tu mgu skyes nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-7: dge slong de ni 'dir yang chos 'chad de; ;rtag tu chos kyi sbyin pa byed par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-8: sems can rnams ni mang du chos thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-9: kye ma'o yon tan chen po 'chad byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-10: nam zhig bdag cag 'di 'dra'i chos ston cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-12: gang dag de 'dra shes rab ldan mchog rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-13: chos rnams gang la'ang zhum par mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-14: dran dang ye shes kyis ni 'phags pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-15: bla na med pa'i ye shes tshig ston 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-16: gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-17: de ni 'phags pas rtag bsngags rgyal bas gnang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-18: chos tshig legs par bshad pa tshol bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-19: de ni thos pas rtag tu 'phags par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-20: thos nas don ni nye bar 'dzin par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-21: shes rab ldan pa 'bru la mi snyems te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-22: don la lta bas rtogs pa 'phel bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-23: de yi ye shes rtag tu tshad med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-24: ye shes mtha' yas don kyang mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358a-25: sems pa mtha' yas dam pa'i don la mkhas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-0: de yi yon tan phyogs dang phyogs @358b su 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-1: de yi thos pa'i yon tan 'di dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-2: de yi 'dod chags chung la zhe sdang chung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-3: de yi gti mug shin tu rab tu chung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-4: sems kyang shin tu dga' ba rnyed par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-5: de yi thos pa'i yon tan 'di dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-6: longs spyod rnyed nas rgyags par mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-7: 'di la snying po ci zhes don la rtog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-8: longs spyod snying po med par rab shes nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-9: de ni longs spyod mi lta rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-10: mngon par byung ste dgon par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-11: rtag tu g-yel ba med pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-12: chos rnams thos pas mi ngoms te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-13: chos sbyin pa la ser sna med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-14: 'jig rten mgon po'i drung nyid du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-15: song ste zhu ba zhu byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-16: de phyir de yi shes rab 'phel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-17: de la dkar po 'bri ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-21: byang chub sems dpa' de la brtson pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-24: de la bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjes su 'jug pa gang zhe na 'di bzhi ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-26: bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' yun ring por sems can rnams yang dag par bsdu bar byed do; ;bzhi gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-33: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:358b-34: de la sbyin pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-6: de la snyan par smra ba gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-8: chos nyan pa la snyan par smra ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-9: de la don byed pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-11: gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-13: theg pa gang la yon tan du 'du shes pa'i theg pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-14: chos de dag la 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can rnams gzhog pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-16: gang slong ba la yid dang bar byed pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-20: gang slong ba rnams la rim gro byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-22: gang gis slong ba rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba'i don de yongs su thob par byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-24: gang slong ba la don mtshungs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-28: sbyor ba yongs su chad pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-30: lhag pa'i bsam pa 'gyod pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-32: theg pa chen po la bsngo ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-34: byams pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i sems kyis btang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-36: dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba la zhugs pa'i sems mi gtong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359a-38: snying rje chen po'i ge cha bgos pa'i sems kyis sems can gyi bya ba la brtson pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-0: btang snyoms la @359b mthon dman med cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bsngo ba'i sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-2: gang chos kyis btsal ba'i longs spyod yongs su gtong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-4: gang la sbyin par byed pa de chos la 'dzud pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-7: gzhan gyi don yang dag par bskyed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-9: gang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-12: phyi'i chos rnams la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-14: gang chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi ye shes la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-16: gang gis don btang ste gzhan gyi don myong bar byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-18: byang chub lag tu 'ong ba la bltas nas gzhan la sbyin pa na yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-19: de la chos sbyin pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-20: gang ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams ston pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-21: de la snyan par smra ba gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-22: gang zang zing med par chos ston pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-24: gang pha rol la lung 'bogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-28: de la don mtshungs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-30: gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bar chos la 'dzud pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:359b-32: chos nyan par 'ongs pa rnams la mi g-yeng bar ston pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-1: ba ni; gang rgyang ring por yang song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-3: de la don byed pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-4: gang chos 'dod pas chos smra ba rnams gos dang bral bar gyur tam bsod snyoms dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-7: yo byad dang bral bar gyur tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-8: ci dgos par gyur pa thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-10: lhag pa'i bsam par zhugs pa'i rgyud kyis chos ston pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-11: gzhan yang chos kyi sbyin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-12: gang sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu shes nas chos sbyin par byed pa'o /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-13: de la snyan par smra ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-14: gang phan pa'i dngos po'i phyir ston pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-18: de la don mtshungs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-19: gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang ba'i phyir chos ston pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-21: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-23: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-24: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;don byed pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-25: gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-27: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-29: gzhan yang sbyin pa ni; byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360a-31: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-0: gang byang chub @360b sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-2: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-4: byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i gnas so; ;snyan par smra ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-5: byang chub kyi myu gu yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-7: byang chub kyi me tog yongs su grub pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-8: don mtshungs par byed pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-9: byang chub kyi 'bras bu mngon par grub pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-12: bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che po yun ring por sems can rnams yang dag par sdud cing byang chub tu spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-14: bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-16: tshad med pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang; bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-18: byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-20: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po des gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byang chub kyi lam de yang bshad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-21: 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-22: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang brjod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:360b-24: de nas gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po las byang chub kyi lam de thos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361a-1: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan yang thos nas dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361a-2: mgu pa rgya chen po rnyed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361a-4: mgu ba rgya chen po rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361a-9: yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361a-11: rim gror byas; mchod par byas nas byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361a-13: de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ces bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod the tshom dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361a-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na nga gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ces bya bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361a-18: ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bza' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361a-22: yo byad rnams kyis lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu bkur stir byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-1: mchod par byas nas byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang nga bcom ldan 'das des gzhon nu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-5: bcom ldan 'das 'od 'phro'i phung po chen po de tshun chad bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog yan lag ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag gi nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nyan thos rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-9: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-10: zag pa zad pa; nyon mongs pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-11: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-13: yang de'i tshe na rgyal po mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-14: 'khor los bsgyur ba chos dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-16: yul gyi mthu dang brtson pa thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-17: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-18: de'i rin po che sna bdun byung ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-21: 'khor lo rin po che nas blon po rin po che'i bar du bdun te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:361b-22: mngon par btul nas gnas pa'i bar du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362a-1: rgyal po mdzes par snang ba de'i pho brang ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362a-2: grong khyer 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362a-3: shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su chur ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362a-5: lho phyogs nas byang phyogs su zheng du ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362a-12: skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362a-13: yang de'i tshe na tshong dpon shes rab bzang zhes bya ba phyug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362a-15: longs spyod che ba nas mdzod dang bang bas yongs su gang ba'i bar du rgyas par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362a-16: sngon gyi sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362a-17: sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bya ba byas pa zhig byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag des tshong dpon shes rab bzang gi bsam pa la brtags nas kye ma'o tshong dpon shes rab bzang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362a-20: kye ma'o tshong dpon shes rab bzang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362a-22: snod du gyur par mkhyen nas tshong dpon shes rab bzang ga la ba der gshegs te phyin nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung du bzhugs nas byang chub kyi lam yang bshad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362b-0: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan @362b 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362b-3: tshong dpon shes rab bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam 'di yang thos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362b-6: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang thos nas dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362b-8: mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362b-11: mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog yan lag nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo stong du 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362b-16: yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362b-19: mchod par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362b-21: yang de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon shes rab bzang zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du the tshom dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:362b-24: de'i tshe de'i dus na nga tshong dpon shes rab bzang zhes bya bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-0: ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog @363a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-1: yan lag nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo stong du na bza' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-5: yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-8: mchod par byas byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag des nga la khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-9: zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-12: dkon mchog yan lag tshun chad bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-13: yang de'i tshe rgyal po dgra thul zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-15: rgyal po dgra thul gyi grong khyer padma can zhes bya ba 'byor pa rgyas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-19: skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba zhig yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-21: rgyal po dgra thul gyi bram ze mar me'i bdag ces bya ba shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-24: longs spyod che ba nas mdzod dang bang ba'i bar du yongs su gang ba zhig byung ba de rgyal po dgra thul la dben zhing phangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-25: sdug cing yid du 'ong ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363a-26: mthong na mi mthun pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363b-0: sh'a ri'i @363b bu; bram ze mar me'i bdag po shing s'a la chen po lta bu la rgyal srid phyed byin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363b-3: rgyal po mar me'i bdag po rgyal po phyed byed pa chos kyis byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363b-7: dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po mar me'i bdag po las bu gzugs bzang po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363b-11: kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363b-12: lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363b-13: de'i lus thams cad las 'od byung ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363b-15: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las 'byung ba bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363b-16: de'i ming mar me mdzad du btags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363b-18: de nas rgyal po mar me'i bdag gis bram ze'i mtshan mkhan ltas shes pa rnams bsags nas rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363b-19: de dag gis de byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363b-20: de ltar rgyal po mar me'i bdag pos rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad ma ma dag la gtad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:363b-21: sh'a ri'i bu; de nas ring po ma lon par rgyal bu mar me mdzad gzhon nur mkhas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-0: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'og min gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad la bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @364a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-1: mar me mdzad la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-2: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-3: yon tan 'byung gnas gyur pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-4: drang srong rgyal mtshan gnas nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-5: byang chub dam pa rtogs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-6: lang tsho myur du 'gro ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-7: rlung gi shugs las lhag par mgyogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-8: rga ba de ni gzugs 'jig ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-10: grogs po rgas pa mthu nyams ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-11: rab tu 'byung bar dka' ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-12: khyod ni shin tu dar la bab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-13: khyod ni btsal ba'i dus yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-14: legs so legs so shes rab che; ;legs so legs so blo gros che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-15: myur du mngon par byung na legs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-16: thub bstan byang chub rtogs par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-17: bam po nyi shu pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-20: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mar me mdzad la bskul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-21: dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de nyid kyi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364a-22: de nyid kyi nub mo de ltar bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur pa'i che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-0: dge bar grags @364b pa'i sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-1: tshigs su bcad pa mngon par byung nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis rgyal po mar me'i bdag gi bus ma bslab par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de nyid kyi nub mo rgya cher sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa'i bar du che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-2: dge bar grags pa'i sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-3: tshigs su bcad pa thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-5: de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis rgyal po mar me'i bdag la khyod kyi sras rab tu byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so; ;zhes bdag gis thos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-7: khyod kyi sras mar me mdzad mthong bar 'tshal na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi drung du gshegs su gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-10: bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-11: zhes pho nya btang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-13: rgyal po mar me'i bdag gis rtsis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-16: 'khor rnams bsags te de ltar gyur pa dag bzlas pa dang de dag gis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-19: bcom ldan 'das de nyid la gsol na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:364b-21: thugs rje che bas thugs rjer dgongs te rgyal po dgra thul gyi drung du gshegs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365a-0: rgyal po dgra thul kyang 'dir mi mchi bar @365a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365a-4: de nas rgyal po mar me'i bdag blon po dag dang 'grogs te bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la pa der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de ltar gyur pa de dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365a-5: de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis rgyal po mar me'i bdag po la de bas na rgyal po chen po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365a-6: thugs brtse ba'i phyir rgyal po dgra thul gyi drung du gshegs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad lha rdzas mchog gi rgyal po'i pho brang du ji srid dgyes par bzhugs nas dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365a-10: byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang thabs cig tu yul rgyu zhing gshegs bzhi pa dang bcas te zham 'bring thog thag tu 'brang zhing bzhi pa dang bcas te zham 'bring thog thag tu 'brang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa la na bza' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-0: yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti byed cing bdag gi yul gyi bar du zham 'bring byas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te mchi ma @365b blags nas slar log pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i pho brang padma can du gshegs par rgyal po dgra thul gyis thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-2: de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang padma can brgyan tes gzhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-4: sum mdo dag la bseg ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-5: gyo mo dag sel du btsud de bsal nas phyag dar dang chag chag 'debs su btsud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-6: spos chu'i chag chag kyang 'debs su btsud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-7: me tog bkram pas pus mo nub tsam du phyin par bya ba byed du btsud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-8: bdug pa'i snod nas kyang bdug pa byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-9: gos rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re bres /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-10: sil snyan sna tshogs kyang dkrol du btsud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-11: de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang padma can brgyan nas gang rgyal po'i pho brang padma can kun na me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-13: byug pa yod pa rnams sus kyang ma spyad cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-15: de thams cad bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la dbul zhing mchod pa'i las su gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-16: la la zhig spyod dam 'tshong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-18: chad pa chen pos gcad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-19: zhes sgra bsgrags so; ;de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:365b-20: phyag bya ba'i phyir dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366a-8: sil snyan sna tshogs dkrol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366a-9: rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366a-10: rgyal po'i 'byor ba chen pos rgyal po'i pho brang padma can nas phyir byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366a-11: padma can gyi bram ze dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366a-12: khyim bdag rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366a-21: ba dan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366a-24: bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te zham 'bring du 'brang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366a-25: rgyal po dgra thul sems dga'/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366a-28: sems rangs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du 'brang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366a-29: yang de'i tshe na gangs kyi ri'i ngos la bram ze rin po che zhes bya ba g-yog bram ze gzhon nu lnga brgya yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366a-32: rig byed gsum po sgra nges par sbyor ba dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-0: shes @366b gsal dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-1: yi ge rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-2: sngon byung ba lnga pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-3: tshig re re zhing lung bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-6: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rjes su rtogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-7: rang gi tshig rab la gsum rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-8: slob dpon du gyur par yongs su shes pa zhig gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-10: yang bram ze rin po che de la gzhon nu sprin zhes bya ba nye gnas byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-13: rig byed gsum po sgra nges par sbyor ba dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-14: shes gsal dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-15: yi ge rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-16: sngon byung ba lnga pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-17: tshig re re zhing lung ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-20: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rjes su rtogs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-21: rang gi tshig rab la gsum rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-22: slob dpon du gyur par yongs su shes pa zhig yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-24: de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin zhes bya bar rig byed lobs nas mkhan po la kye mkhan po /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-25: bdag gis rig byed lobs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-28: bdag gis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:366b-30: slob dpon la nor 'gron bu lnga brgya byin cig ces des de skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-0: de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis mkhan po'i rkang pa la phyag @367a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-1: 'tshal te lan gsum bskor nas mkhan po'i drung nas song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-5: rgyal po'i pho brang dag na rgyu zhing slob dpon la dbul ba'i slob dpon gyi nor btsal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-6: des slob dpon la dbul ba'i slob dpon gyi nor bsdus nas mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang padma can du phyin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-7: bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis rgyal po'i pho brang padma can kun brgyan par mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-8: mthong nas mi zhig bos te kye skyes bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-9: rgyal po'i pho brang padma can 'dir ci'i dga' ston zhig g-yos par gyur ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-10: des gzhon nu khyod kyis mi shes sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-11: de ring bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-12: byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i pho brang padma can du gshegs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-13: de'i phyir rgyal po'i pho brang padma can 'di kun brgyan to; ;de la mi dag sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-15: zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-16: de nas bram ze sprin gzhon nus sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos nas dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-18: mgu pa cher skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dkon te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367a-19: shin tu dkon pa au dum wa ra'i me tog dang 'dra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-0: mchod sbyin gyi shing gcig pu'i @367b tshul lta bu yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-1: gang bdag gis karsha pa na lnga brgya po 'dis me tog nyos te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la me tog gtor la slob dpon gyi nor gud nas btsal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-3: yang de'i tshe na bu mo zhig me tog autpa la bdun khyer te lam gyi srang nas song ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-4: de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis bu mo de la kye bu mo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-5: chu nas byung ba'i me tog gang nas rnyed par gyur ces de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-6: des phyogs che ge mo zhig na phreng ba byed pa'i khang pa nas bdag gis karsha pa na lnga brgyas nyos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-8: de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis bu mo de la me tog chu las skyes pa 'di dag ji tsam gyis nyos pa bzhin du nga la tshong zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-9: ces de skad ces smras nas des de ltar mi rung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-10: zhes smras nas des 'o na gnyis khyod la zhog la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-11: lnga nga la karsha pa na lnga brgyas nyor byin cig ces smras nas des 'di dag gis ci bya zhes smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-12: des bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la gtor bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-14: des gal te khyod srid pa'i 'gro ba 'chi 'pho thams cad du bdag gi khyim thab tu 'gyur bar dam 'cha' na sbyin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-16: khyod de skad ma zer cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-21: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:367b-22: bskal pa grangs med pas bsgrub dgos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-14: rgyal srid kyang yongs su btang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-15: shing rta yongs su btang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-16: slas yongs su btang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-18: bu mo yongs su btang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-19: lag pa yongs su btang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-22: gtsug phud yongs su btang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-26: yan lag mchog yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-28: nang ngam phyi'i dngos po gang yang bdag gis yongs su mi gtang bar bya ba med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-30: gang bdag gis khyod kyang yongs su btang ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba'i dus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-34: khyod nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad ma byed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-35: ces de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-36: des gal te khyod lus las sha yungs kar gyi 'brum bu tsam du bcad de ngal byin du zin kyang ngas khyod kyi byin pa'i bar chad mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-37: zhes smras nas des de la de ltar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368a-38: chu las skyes pa'i me tog dag nga la byin cig ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368b-0: de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis me tog autpa la de dag blangs nas @368b bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368b-1: spyod lam mdzes pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368b-2: de bcom ldan 'das la sems dang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368b-3: de sems dang bar gyur nas shin tu dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368b-5: bkur sti bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis mi mang po dag gis gos bzang po bzang bdag bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyi drung du bkram pa mthong nas des bdag la gos med kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368b-6: gang bdag gis ri dvags kyi pags pa 'di gding ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368b-7: snyam nas de ri dvags kyi bags pa de bting ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368b-8: de na mi de dag 'di 'dra ba'i sems can dkon mchog gi drung du ri dvags kyi pags pa gding ngam zhes 'phya zhing bting ba yang brtul bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368b-9: de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin phyogs kyi mtha' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ri dvags kyi bags pa bting ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:368b-10: dgongs shig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kun nas spyan ri dvags kyi pags pa 'di la zhabs gzhag par mdzad cig ces sems bskyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:369a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis dgongs nas bram ze @369a *//

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:374a-8: rgyal po'i khab kyi mi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:374a-9: mi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag gis tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin g-yog dang bcas te rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung bar mthong ngo //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:374b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ga la ba der song ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa mi shes pa ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:375b-0: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang lags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de ltar de dag @375b la chos bstan du gsol /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:375b-9: srog chags khri po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:375b-10: rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:375b-16: bdag cag la dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:375b-25: da ltar bcom ldan 'das tshogs la gdams ngag mdzad pa de bzhin du tshogs la gdams par bgyi'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:376b-4: steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu yang sil snyan stong phrag du ma yongs su ma bzung ba dag gis khyab par gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377a-2: gus pa dang rje sa cher byed do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377a-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377a-11: 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377a-13: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377a-20: bran mo bdun gyis nga la mchod pa byas te bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du log par lhung bar mi 'gro ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377b-0: de bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgya 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs @377b rgyas ded dpon zhes bya ba mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377b-1: mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377b-4: mchod par byed par 'gyur; de'i 'og tu bskal pa nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377b-12: de dag bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377b-16: byang chub sems dpa' mis byin gyi zham 'bring ba gang yin pa thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:377b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa ming tha dad par 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:378a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs 'jam zhes bya bar thams cad ming mthun par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:378a-7: srog chags khri po de las srog chags bzhi brgya ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:378a-17: srog chags drug stong po de dag las srog chags stong ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:378b-0: nga yongs su mya ngan las @378b 'das te dam pa'i chos nub nas mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:378b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:378b-4: srog chags stong po de dag gis rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:378b-8: gang zag gi mchog byams pa de yang mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:378b-12: de'i 'og tu bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:378b-14: srog chags khri po las srog chags mthong ba skyes ba stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:378b-15: lha'i bu khri phrag drug cu ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:378b-16: chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:378b-18: byis pa rnams ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la su zhig dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-1: byed; de ci'i phyir zhe na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-9: gang yang mya ngan 'das pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-10: ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-11: de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-12: gang yang bzhugs la mchod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-13: gang yang mya ngan 'das pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-14: ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-15: sems kyang mnyam la 'bras bu mnyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-16: mnyam pa'i sems su byas nas ni //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-18: de yi rnam par smin pa mnyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-19: mtshungs par byang chub 'tshang yang rgya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-20: bde bar gshegs pa'i lam bzung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-21: ngan par 'gro ba'i lam yang bcad; ;mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i lam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-22: de yang de la mi dkon no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-23: sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-24: sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin mchog gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-25: de phyir mchog la dad byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-27: mchod pa dam pa byas nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-28: myur du mchog tu 'gyur ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379a-29: chos kyi dam pa ston mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-0: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas @379b mchog tu 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-1: mi gang mkhas pa sangs rgyas kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-2: chos la brten par 'dod pa de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-3: 'dun pa drag po bskyed par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-4: mang du thos nas tshul bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-5: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-6: tshangs pa dbang byed gyur nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-7: yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-9: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-12: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'dun pa drag po bskyed de shin tu mnyan par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-18: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan tam; blangs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-24: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-25: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-26: tshad med pa bzhi dang mi 'bral ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:379b-27: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-0: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams sdud @380a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-3: gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-4: byang chub kyi lam yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-6: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang 'brel to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi nang du bcug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-12: ngas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bslab nas yang dag par chad pa rjes su thob po; ;pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rjes su thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-13: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu son pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la nges par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa rgyun ma bcad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-18: rnam pa thams cad kyi tshad med pa'i rjes su thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-19: de bzhin gshegs pas dpag tu med pa rjes su thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-20: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rjes su thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-21: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la shin tu gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-23: lus kyi las dang rnam smin gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380a-24: rnam par smin pa shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-0: las smin rnam smin @380b ma yin gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-1: de bde de ni mya ngan 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-2: gang las shes pa med pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-3: 'dus byas thams cad sdug bsngal te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-4: de phyir shes pa bskyed pas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-5: 'dus byas kun las rnam par grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-11: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-12: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-15: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra po dhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-17: a'arya dharma t'a sh'i las bsgyur cing zhus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-001:380b-18: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa /
